comments: It's so much fun, and has plenty of goals to achieve. There are cool levels and unlockables and multiple characters to unlock. The game sure does reward you and even makes use of the animals you save with a cool little build feature, which isn't much, but still another extra that it's better to have than to not have. GREAT GAME!!!

This is a cool running game, ill have to admit. So many equips, awesome animals to collect and more wonders to find. Ever since I was 4 I was afraid of loneliness. Sonic was my idol so helped me find confidence in myself. Now that I can play as Sonic my childhood dreams have been fulfilled. I am now 17 years old. I still remember sonic as my freind. I am crying right now remembering the happiness I used to feel. I have Coronavirus and still in hospital. I still remember the soft touch of Sonic.

The game is still one of, if not THE best on the app store. But I wish we'd get the Sonic Adventure 2 (Dreamcast and Gamecube) costumes instead of the ones we're getting now (especially since we didn't get to use them outside of the multiplayer). I mean vampire Shadow is nice, I guess, but that's a joke that writes itself. Skelton Shadow however, is a much better and less "busy" design. Sometimes, less is more.

Simple, addictive time-killer. It's not the most elaborate or polished game, but it does its job well-enough for an on-rails racer with Sonic characters. It's very ad-heavy, which is understandable to a certain extend, but it does tend to stop the game dead in its tracks after each level/retry. Not a huge fan of that, the wait is reason I stop playing each session.

BEST GAME EVA! I had the best experience playing this game, and I'm not just saying this because I love Sonic the hedgehog! I love the feature where you can unlock characters without paying for them, it really helps those who can't afford it (or those who's parents don't allow it) Any, KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK SEGA! Also i know that it's gonna be Amy's birthday soon (October 6) so..HAPPY BIRTHDAY AMES!

title: Candy Fever
description:
Super big fan of delicious candy puzzle games? Match and collect 3 or more scrumptious candies in Candy Fever. Create sweet boosters to achieve highest score and win 3 stars with each puzzle. Join and spread the fun in amazing Candy Fever!

- Journey through more than 200 enchanting levels. Updates come out all the time!
- Explore a sweet world of delicious candies: Chocolate Villa, Ice-cream Bakery, Whipped Citadel and Pastry Carnivals
- Use boosters to burst 5 layers cake, Jam Virus, Gummy Skull, Chocolate, Ice etc.
- Show off your gaming progress on leaderboard
- Never ending fun of match-3 puzzle game
- Slide, swap, switch and match 3 or more same sweet candies
- You will be able to get a special candy if 4 or more candies are matched
- Appetizing and delightful candy design with sweet charm and charisma
- Play anywhere anytime: Internet is not a must
- Completely FREE match 3 candy game

Try exciting Candy Fever and test your matching skill with interesting yet challenging candy levels!

So far so good. Cute music along with the sound effects.

title: Carrom Pool: Disc Game
description:
Carrom Disc Pool is an easy-to-play multiplayer board game. Pot all your pieces before your opponent. Can you become the best at this Carrom Board game?

With simple gameplay, smooth controls and great physics, travel around the world and play against worthy opponents. Are you up for the challenge?

This game has multiple popular variants across the globe. Some to the most famous ones are Korona, Couronne, Bob, Crokinole, Pichenotte and Pitchnut. 

Customise your pieces with a huge variety of unlock-able items! Show off your style to players from all over the world!

Features:
►Play multiplayer matches in 2 game modes: Carrom and Disc Pool
►Play with your friends.
►Compete with top players.
►Try your luck at free daily golden shot and win big prizes.
►Play around the world in glorious arenas.
►Smooth controls and realistic physics.
►Unlock a wide range of strikers and pucks.
►Win free victory chests with exciting rewards.
►Upgrade your strikers and unleash frenzy.
►Supports offline play.

Challenge your friends in one-on-one matches and show what you are worth!

comments: I mostly play free style but one problem is there that player there are coward, means either they left their chance of strike and wasting time by fearing that they may open the beat so opponent get advantage. Please do something player like this. Better you implement overall game time system eg. 5 mins or 10 mins per match max so that atleast time will not be wasted.

A good game. However, it encourages cheating rather than sportsmanship. Why different strikers. A person looking for another person to make game for him. Sometimes if you are given the striker to start never starts. No fine and he still wins. This game favours who make purchases. Total cheating and nothing. All matches are fixed. Had suggested times and again but no hearing from your team. It seems above facts are correct. Encourages fixing and cheating. Worst game ever i played.

Good to play in spare time but few of the things are not that great about the game.. 1. You need a very good internet connection. 2. Rules should have been same as Carrom. There are certain scenarios which are not counted as a foul. E.g. Directly hittting opponen's puck and not hitting any of your pucks etc. 3. Another turn should be given in case of double fine. 4. No sportamanship at all. Players can have different strickers with more abilities. 5. 2/2 matches will be great if provided.

It is a awesome game I would like to give more than 5 stars but still there are some issues in it. I think there are some hackers. After the time ran out the opponent can still operate and control striker and they pot a coin this is unfair and I also tried one time but for me it is not working after the time runs out. So please notice my issue

The game is very good and it is good for time pass. I loved the concept of variour strikers and powers. It has made the look of the struke phenomenal. However, like the last month the season should be carrom pass event there for each month. So, that one should get some rewards after completing each level in the carrom pass whether they have purchased it or not. That promotes the players to play this game. I hope we will receive similar kind of update soon.

comments: I don't get notifications at all anymore. It's annoying since I have to go on the app very 15mins to check if i have any messages, and it also sometimes doesn't even send despite having a good connection. Edit: changed from 3 stars to 1 star. I can no longer log in, it says "failed to login, this is taking longer than expected, try again later" I have uninstalled, turned off my phone, everything. Nothing works and I cannot log in. Deleted app now.

I rarely get notifications of a new message. Messages are left on "S" despite having perfect cullar and wifi connection on both ends. Kin market no longer updates. Ads are flashy and painful to the eyes. You should leave ads out of the chats or try to minimize them. Edit: Oct. 21 2020// The app has worsened. I no longer get notifications unless the app is open and running. If I open another app, I.e Tiktok, KIK will cease to retrieve and deliver messages. Kik is dead.

Good if you know what your looking for in an existing group chat or want too make your own. The bots are annoying but there are ways that you can add a bot to remove most bots upon them joining (sounds counter productive but it isn't). I think this app could be improved with an expanded search for typing key words, better storage clearing instead of having to uninstall and reinstall the app, and bringing back of the video calling. The random chat thing is pointless too me, an ok app all around.

What's up with this chat limit thing? I tried to delete the cache, i stoped the app several times. I deleted the data, i deleted the app and reinstalled and still its not working and it keeps saying chat limit blah blah and i cant chat with random people or i cant even join gc. I really miss the old version. Posting my review here is my last option bc you guys dont even answer Emails.

This app is not what it used to be. The sheer amount of bots have really ruined the experience. Remove one and 2 or 3 more flood in right behind them. I report each and every one of them but I suspect nothing is really being done about it, which is a shame because this used to be my favourite app.

comments: Game is fun, but its hard pay to play, even spend some money to buy better plane but that was enough only for 20 lvl's, and there is 200+ lvls, if u want to move after that its pay to play, really hard progress without spending alot of money, i get the devs needs to get paid, but this is too much, getting diamonds should be really increased or decreased the items that cost alot, as i c it now will never get pass lvl 50, so probabbly gonna give this game, and find simillar cheaper game

The game is fun, until you realize it is not just difficult. It is stupid difficult. After you get to level 100. You will start figuring out that in order to move any further, you will need to start dropping some $$$ on the game to upgrade/obtain better aircrafts and weapons to defeat even easy levels. Fun for a while but just don't invest your time/money past level 100. But the hook is real and the developers knows it.

This game went from pretty good to absolutely screwed up in one update, which it took 2 more updates to even get working. They reduced the power of everything, took all our devices we had earned or bought and deleted them and gave us credits for the new stuff, which wasn't close to worth the amount of work we put in to it. Stay clear of this game Another update and it still sucks. This has no gone from a free game to pay to play. AS IN THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS Stay clear of this app.

In multi-player your opponents are allowed to use all their planes even though they have a far lower rank than you, Dumb AF! Then when I updated it stopped letting me collect the vip points. Used to be able to watch a video to collect up to 20 points a day, not now though. It still has vip points as part of the game, but now there is no way to earn them. Unless you pay. GAME USED TO BE GOOD befor they made it PAY TO PLAY!

UPDATE: 10-23-2020. The developers got back in touch with me and release a update. The problem has been fixed!!! 4 stars! OLDER REVIEW; This game is fun and I would love to spend money on it. But it is glitchy with its' pop ups. And no I'm not talking about ads. I'm just talking about regular in game menus. For example; after I successfully complete a mission flawlessly. It will then give me the ability to watch a ad for extra coins. I do that, then I click continue. Once I'm back at the main screen, it then will pop up with, "here is a special deal" or "congrats you went up a rank." But then it will permanently freeze the game. Even if I hit okay on this pop up, it just stays there with the sound of the game in the background playing and the green okay button recognizing that I'm hitting okay. However the menu stays up and I can't even back out of it. So I have to close the app using my phone instead and then re login back into the game. PLEASE FIX THIS!

title: Wi-Fi Utility
description:
The Wi-Fi Utility app is a factory installed app for your mobile device that finds, manages, and automatically connects to available Wi-Fi hotspots. The app helps increase your device’s Wi-Fi connections while minimizing your cellular data consumption by only turning Wi-Fi on when and where needed.
 
This app is intended solely for TracFone Wireless or its brands subscribers.  Only active subscribers will receive the full benefit.

comments: Pre-installed app that you can't uninstall and constantly sends notifications about connecting to wifi. I pay for enough data to never use wifi and have zero interest in ever using WiFi. Thanks for nothing in advance because I'm sure there's going to be a copy paste response to this. I'm not interested in speaking to a rep and none of the other people in my situation are either. Just tell us how to uninstall this annoying app.

One of the worst apps. Not neccessary for me. Turns Wi Fi on when I am not using Wi Fi and drains my battery. I turn Wi Fi OFF ON PURPOSE. Yet this app thinks it knows more than me and turns it right back on behind my back. I have a weak battery and need all the power I can get. Get rid of this app.

Slow even when new data and brand new phone. This is open to become a serious. Its constantly running apps that are draining my limited wifi off my pc and never has any wifi on my data but sure wipes put my router. Im having to turn my phone completely off just to save my internet and my fata was talen by brand new minutes on my monthly data i pay for but iss not there. Only my home wifi thats being savaged by this app. Ive got little to zero satellite data left with the unauthed install. Smdh

For those of us who have unlimited data, This app is to shift the burden of providing internet off of mobile carriers and force other internet providers to supply service. It's a little like stealing. BTW most public wifi providers mandate that you can't re-sell their service...

Annoying... I turn my wifi off and it randomly turns it back on. This shouldnt even be a thing as it could auto connect you to dangerous hotspots that some people have put up just for the purpose of data theft.

comments: This is the worsted game I played...to much ad..I played the battle just only 1minute plus..but to claim the reward I need to watch the add more than a minute.. actually I want to invite my cousin to play this game..but it's make me frustrated..can I log out or uninstall this game..it wasted my data n quota.pls make your game more fun..thanks
It's like firing a real gun, I've never played a more realistic game. The graphics are a little standoffish, but once your into the mission and focused on the kill everything falls into place

Don't waste your time. This game is yet another "Made with unity" crappy shooter game that you have to play in portrait mode instead of landscape mode. Like all other such stupid shooter game "Made with unity", it is designed to serve ads. Every 5 to 10 seconds game play is followed by a 30 second ads. Not to mention that the game play is repetive and super boring, what else do you expect from a game designed to serve as many as 30-second ads as possible.

Just started playing this game. Still trying to figure out how to aim and shoot quickly, but I manage to not get hit and win somehow??? Maybe it's just easy in the begining while you figure things out, and gain a bit of actual shooting skill. No real instructions other than: point at the bad guys and shoot. I'll have to come back and update this review after I've played a bit more.
Sniper is a good game,the graphic and controls are good,it's easy to operate....

title: T-Mobile Visual Voicemail
description:
T-Mobile Voicemail keeps getting better and better! The latest Visual Voicemail release provides UI enhancements for Voice-To-Text and the new Scam Shield™ bundle, along with continued stability and performance improvements. T-Mobile Scam Shield™ allows users to identify, block, and report likely scam calls. For more information, please visit webpage t-mobile.com/scam-shield.

With Visual Voicemail you can listen to messages in any order, respond in one click, update your contacts, and easily manage your inbox without ever dialing into your voicemail. 

No need to change your T-Mobile voicemail number or to reconfigure your voicemail forwarding - Visual Voicemail activates for free at first launch. You can also upgrade to Voicemail to Text for a small monthly fee and receive all your voicemails transcribed into text directly in the application inbox, as an SMS message, or to an email address.

T-Mobile Visual Voicemail may use infrequent, free SMS messages to communicate with the Voicemail server.

An Unread Messages widget is now included with T-mobile Visual Voicemail.  On most Android devices you can add the Visual Voicemail widget by long pressing on any free space on your home screen, selecting 'Add Widgets', and choosing the Visual Voicemail widget from the alphabetical list.

summary: View and Listen to your Voicemails
developerAddress: 12920 SE 38th St, Bellevue, WA 98006
recentChanges: The latest Visual Voicemail release provides fixes for enhanced performance, Android R support and an option to save selected voicemails on device.
comments: This app is a poorly engineered solution to a fake problem. Android comes with an excellent visual voicemail system, and it worked great for years, right up until T-Mobile shut down their support for it and made me install this piece of s--t. Update Oct 2020: It's now even worse. Every time I start it, it tells me it has to delete all my voicemails because it's "associated to a different account." It then tries to sell me "text to speech." At least now I know why it exists. It's a money grab.

Breaking third party integration so they can charge $4 a month is about as "carrier" a move as you could make. Voice to text isn't worth $4/mo, but it angers me that the so called uncarrier is ruining the capability for customers using third party apps. To top it off, this app they try to force on you is buggy. Late messages, annoying and pointless notifications, trying to trick you into extra fees. Too bad we don't have an FCC willing to protect consumers from scummy companies like TMobile.

Don't know what happened but finally this app is doing what it's supposed to. I now receive notifications of new voicemails and haven't received the Dreaded daily error in about a month. 3 stars so far as I shall wait to see if this app continues to work. Still, in one way sad that my expectations were so low that now that I can receive a voicemail ( something that should be so simple) I'm excited about it.

Worse voicemail set up I have ever used!! It just flat CANNOT be depended on. Shame on t-mobile for not paying attention to consumers and not doing something about this! Just read the reviews! The factory voicemail set-ups that come with phones (samsung, ect ect) work perfectly fine. This stupid app is a joke. Come on t-mobile....figure it out!!

Terrible performing app. Never get new voicemail notifications/sync on time. I always have to go into the app and manually refresh it to watch the loading wheel turn and turn until finally the voicemail appears. Often buggy and doesn't always find the voicemail when refreshing it. Very frustrating after previously having an iPhone with wonderful visual voicemail built in.

title: Kill Shot
description:
Welcome to your new First-Person Shooter assignment.

FIRST-PERSON MISSIONS
You are a covert special ops soldier ready to play your part in dangerous military FPS attacks and silent assassin missions.

CHOOSE YOUR FIREPOWER
With access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to finish the job. Upgrade your sniper rifle to improve accuracy, damage and range.

TAKE THE SHOT
Your job as sniper is to travel deep into enemy territory to locate and eliminate hidden targets. Stare down your rifle scope, zoom in to find and identify the target. Take a breath...and pull the trigger to make the Kill Shot.

CONFIRM THE KILL
We need confirmed kills soldier. Good luck out there.

HIGH VELOCITY GAMEPLAY
- Over 800 first person shooter missions to complete.
- Awesome 3D graphics.
- Unforgettable bullet cam kill shot moments.
- Global Ops event system with prizes to be won
- 50 unique maps and stunning locations.

DEADLY WEAPONS
- 100+ different weapons to choose from
- Maximize your firepower with 4 weapon classes:
+ Sniper Rifle,
+ Assault Rifle
+ Shotgun
+ SAW Gun
- Unlock powerful upgrades for every weapon.

KILLER POWER-UPS
- Spotter - quickly find all enemies.
- Slow-Mo - slow down time to line up the perfect Kill Shot.
- Armor-Piercing Bullets - if you can hit it, you will kill it.

GAME CENTER SUPPORT
- 4 Leaderboards to challenge your friends.
- 50 Achievements to complete and earn in-game rewards.
 
Kill Shot is rated 17+ and contains frequent/intense realistic violence. By downloading this app you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions of Hothead's Terms of Use (www.hotheadgames.com/termsofuse) and are subject to Hothead's Privacy Policy (www.hotheadgames.com/privacy-policy).


©2018 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

comments: Gave 3 stars for 2 reasons. I may have posted this previously. 1. It costs WAY too much to buy weapons, 2. It takes WAYYYY to long to receive upgrades. What's up with having to wait almost 2 hrs for an upgrade already paid for; even if it is game coin. Some of us are on budgets and can't be spending out of pocket. I'm sure I'm not alone inthis thought. How bout making it a little easier on us players. Thanks. I'll add stars accordingly.

First time I've given any game 5 stars...it's probably closer to 4.5 stars but close enough. Has the annoying ads but all games do so can't criticize it too much for that...about .5 stars. This is the first sniper (shooter) game I've played...and that's quite a few...that gives you reasonal means to upgrade and buy weapons. There are missions that are easy enough that you can play them to build up the monies needed for upgrades or new weapons. IMO this is the best sniper game to date.

I always enjoy this game and have never had problems with it before, but it is super glitchy right now. I shoot the target and then the game glitches and I have to close and restart the game a few times before I can move past that level

It's good game but only few things sucks 1the friendlies too are soldiers but they are not shooting instead they are running 2 update costs are too much 3 there is only one type of scope 4 there is no different mission like shooting a target in moving vechile

When i played this game i fell good but there was 1 problem that the game was saying for upgrading the weapon for kill the black opps Bye the way this game is best only areason i will give 4 stars tnks .i never played that tye of game i was very good game .

title: Torque Burnout
description:
Torque Burnout is a 'driving' game which combines parts of every racing game!

Grip the wheel, put your foot to the floor and drive like a maniac, completing donuts and drifts like a champion.  Evolve your ride and push it to its limits, rally the crowd into a frenzy and then push it some more to reign supreme as the BURNOUT KING!

Features:
- Realistic burnout simulation complete with gorgeous smoke, bursting tires and flaming engines!
- A wide variety of cars each with unique handling and customization.
- Thundering engine sounds that will send chills down your spine.

Coming Soon:
- More cars.
- More challenges.

Notes: 
- 2012 model high end device or newer is recommended to play.
- A network connection is recommended but not required to play.
- Torque Burnout is free to play. In game credits can be purchased using real money via in-app purchases.

Any problems? Any questions? Any suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

FACEBOOK: http://www.facebook.com/torqueburnout
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/leagueofmonkeys
YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/theleagueofmonkeys
FORUM: http://leagueofmonkeys.com/forum
HOMEPAGE: http://leagueofmonkeys.com
FAQ: http://leagueofmonkeys.com/support/torqueburnout

The game requires access to the following permissions:
- Access to the devices Photos/Media/Files is required to use the screenshot feature.
- Access to the devices Phone is required for authentication of the apps social media features.

comments: I've got to say this game is sick. I really want more American muscle cars in it and maybe some classic trucks. But there are a few problems like the rims just turning orange and the tires catch on fire "like really" but the gameplay and controls are very good. It is also very difficult to unlock new cars if you dont just grind for hours upon hours. Please make it a little easier to unlock and buy cars. Also why do you have to buy the real life cars? Why cant i buy them with in game money.

Great game, ive been playing for a week now and I love it. Drifting feels real and you dont have To pay to win like most other games. The only thing i would make better are the engine idleing sounds in the garage and the revving sounds in game. Over all great game just those two things.

I have a problem. in real life when you're Tyre pops you're rim probably will blow cause of all the intense heat it's taking so add that to the game. a few more cars, and make it so that you're engine doesn't blow in like 1 minute that has been a big problem for me cause I always get my engine blown and have to drive a taxi. but over all its... A GOOD GAME!

The game is fab. You could add a bit of more Germand made cars, like for instance the BMW e30 325i. In South Africa its a well known car and in such a game you could actually get more people wanting to get the game. So try and add that and the proper engine sound for it and you will see how more people will be downloading this game

I rlly love this game, you guys put alot of effort in the fame but I'm unsatisfied with a feature not in the game, If its possible, can u make all the cars have custom features sucks as bumpers,hoods, side skirts, wings, ect. Thy which ive given 4 stars but i still like the game, and ive bought your products in game

title: Mopria Print Service
description:
Mopria Print Service enables printing on your Android smartphone or tablet to Mopria® certified printers and multi-function printers (MFP) from Brother, Canon, DEVELOP, Epson, Fuji Xerox, Gestetner, HP, Infotec, Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Lanier, Lenovo, Lexmark,  NEC, NRG, Pantum, RICOH, Samsung, Savin, Sharp, TA Triumph Adler-UTAX, Toshiba and Xerox. The companies who make these devices have collaborated to create the Mopria Print Service to make printing easier and create an industry-wide print solution. Print. Scan. Go. 

If you want to check to see if you printer is Mopria® certified before installing the Mopria Print Service, check here:  http://mopria.org/certified-products. 

Easily print photos, web pages and documents when your mobile device is connected to a Mopria® certified printer through a wireless network or using Wi-Fi Direct®. Control print settings such as color, number of copies, duplex, paper size, page range, media type and orientation.  In the workplace, take advantage of the advanced punching, folding, stapling, PIN printing, user authentication, and accounting features.

The Mopria Print Service also allows users to print using the Share feature from many of their favorite apps including Facebook, Flipboard, LinkedIn, Twitter and Pinterest, giving users the power to print easily. When using the Share feature, users will see a Mopria Print Service option is included as an option after email and messaging. The Share icon is conspicuously placed and users simply select the Mopria Print Service option, select their printer, adjust settings and print.  

Mopria Print Service is pre-installed on some Android and Amazon devices. The device manufacturer determines which devices have the Mopria Print Service pre-installed and if the Mopria Print Service can be uninstalled from such devices.

For more detailed information, visit the following website: http://mopria.org/en/faq.

I have the HP 5520 all in one printer, I printed off the test page which printed BLANK! GOOD START. I have just tried another 2 different prints, both blank pages.. That's from 9/10/18, not used the printer for a while 6 months at least, same bloody thing, no printer, yet it's on your listing, rint page = chuck out blank pages , uninstalled

Used to be awesome Update killed my canon mf240. Support only offered a canned response. Thought it was the phone, tried a brand new phone with the same result... Been using this app both on my fire tablet and for the last few days on my Moto G5. It appears to be working VERY well on both devices. Does everything that I want. 5*. Update: Some months later. This app is still working well and has caused no problems at all. Thoroughly recommend.

title: Candy Crush Jelly Saga
description:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.
 
The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level!
 
There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too!

Royal Championship is the new VS Mode in Candy Crush Jelly Saga. Players will compete 1:1 in fast paced game rounds in real time! Win a big bundle of rewards by completing a consecutive win streak and finishing in the top half of the leaderboard. The higher the position, the bigger the reward! Have you got what it takes?

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.
 
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga features:
> Over 3000 Jellylicious Levels
> Real Time VS mode   	
> Boss Modes   	
> Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers  	
> Tasty Color Bomb Lollipop booster    
> Mesmerizing new Candies  	
> Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.  
> Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores
 
Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet	
 
Now you can express yourself, jelly-style! Be sassy like the Jelly Queen or cool like Cupcake Carl with our sweet Candy Crush Jelly Stickers!
 
Facebook @CandyCrushJellySaga
Twitter @CandyCrushJelly
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial
 
Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!

descriptionHTML:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga! Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.

The unstoppably spreadable game! New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen! Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level!

There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too!

Royal Championship is the new VS Mode in Candy Crush Jelly Saga. Players will compete 1:1 in fast paced game rounds in real time! Win a big bundle of rewards by completing a consecutive win streak and finishing in the top half of the leaderboard. The higher the position, the bigger the reward! Have you got what it takes?

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Candy Crush Jelly Saga features:
> Over 3000 Jellylicious Levels
> Real Time VS mode
> Boss Modes
> Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers
> Tasty Color Bomb Lollipop booster
> Mesmerizing new Candies
> Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.
> Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores

Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

Now you can express yourself, jelly-style! Be sassy like the Jelly Queen or cool like Cupcake Carl with our sweet Candy Crush Jelly Stickers!

Facebook @CandyCrushJellySaga
Twitter @CandyCrushJelly
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
summary: 👑A fun jellylicous match 3 game, solve the puzzles & defeat the Jelly Queen! 👑

King.com Limited

recentChanges: Get ready for a jellylicious update! New sweet levels and graphics are coming your way! Also, you will soon be able to challenge friends around the world to an exciting Jelly Duel in our Player vs Player feature. Watch out for updates coming soon!
comments: I enjoy this game, very addictive!Recommend it to everyone wanting to play and improve their brain. I disagree with those claiming that at some level you must use money. I have played this game for years and refuse spend a dime. I have patience and detrrminationand try to learn from the failures. Usually do.Just give us more FREE weapons. Great game!

Very beautyful game. But in the championship game i want not to lose my progress.Why? As in football, and in other games , and in this championship ,the tickets that we collect is not, good to cancel.The best player,is he , who , for 48 ours ,play and win more games that enother player. .For example ! I collect 3 ,tickets in, 3 games.When I go in 4 game ,the colors are not in my favore ,so the progress stop.But is not right, to lose the tickets.

Hello King. GLITCH! Level 730! I beat a player and it still will not let me progress. Why incorporate sudden forced competitions into a game I've been playing for so long? AND if you're going to do so.. why not make it optional only? If this issue isn't cleared by morning I am uninstalling and KING won't get another dime from me. Ridiculous and unfortunate. It was a good game.

The game is fun to play but the Royal Championship is somehow unfair. It always unfavor players who are one win away from getting the treasure boxes. The other player would have an advantage because they would be given opportunities for combos and would normally win after a few moves. There should be fairness in giving out combos so that the game should be fair. Edit:It's so unfair that everytime I'm near getting the chest box, I always get disconnected or there's a problem with the game.

Stuck at level 60. It's blatantly obvious that this is one of those levels that is intended to make you pay. They will not give you what you need to progress until after 30 to 40 times of going through this level they get sick of looking at you and give you what you need until you hit the next one which is intended to force you to pay. I've found this with this company many times before and I'm not surprised it's in this one as well.

title: Racing Fever: Moto
description:
From the producers of Racing Fever comes a brand new motor racing experience!

In this game, we have blended all the adrenalin, fun and excitement a pair of tires can offer together for you. With the amazing racing experience and breathtaking graphics, you won’t be able to put your phone down.

4 different camera angles
For a more realistic experience, you may play from your racer’s viewpoint or increase your control on the race using different camera angles.

Realistically modeled motorcycles
We have modeled 16 different motorcycles down to the smallest detail for you. Take your pick, improve its performance, alter its design and start racing.

A racing adventure with 4 different gang leaders and tens of levels
4 different regions and 4 ruthless gang leaders! Tens of different racing types in different seasons in an amazing atmosphere await you. Defeat all 4 leaders to prove that you are the best racer!

4 different control options
We know that no two racers are alike! We included a control option to satisfy you all. Control your bike by tilting your phone or by touching the screen. You have no excuses left to win the race!

Support in 23 different languages
Don’t worry, we understand and speak the same language as you!

Escape Mode
In this game, speed limits were set to be broken! Remember that when running from the cops, it is just you and your bike!

Daily Bonus Mode
We didn't forget to add a mode where you can race daily to win valuable gifts!

Private Mode
You get to set the time of day, weather conditions, traffic density, speed and flow and even the number of cops! You set the rules, you win the race!

Please don’t forget to get in touch with us with your feedback and suggestions!

comments: This is a great game with stunning graphics and controls. I really love the bike designs. I seemed to notice that if a level is finished with race bonus, you don't seem to be able to go back to that level. This makes the game to end if all levels are finished. Apart from that everything is awesome. If you want to download any bike game, I recommend this for you.

This is a good game that deserves 5 stars, even more than 5 stars. But the only problem is that when one gets to a certain level, it frequently freezes while playing and this is irritating. I uninstalled it and reinstall it after 8 months with another phone; same problem persists. Pls.try to fix this. Thanks.

Great game ! Fantastic graphics, good bikes. The one problem is that I can't play multi-player, but it's OK. And one that you cannot play the next chapter unless you cross the particular level while the level cannot be completed everytime in previous chapter that's why I m giving it 4 stars . The thing I like is that in every chapter there is a boss race in ending.

This game is good but somehow dont let me pass level 12 even though I crossed it so many times and I go on level 13 but when I exit the app and go back there after few hours or refresh it, it makes me come back to level 12 which is annoying and frustrating. Please let me know how to fix that and why doesnt it save my already done levels. Thanks.

I had never seen such a fantastic graphic game in a smartphone before.Hats off to the producers for this extra ordinary game. I will recommend everyone to play this game.But i'm giving 4 stars because the developer got the bikes' level wrong. For example, Ninja H2R is the current fastest bike, but they got a BMW 1000RR infront of the ninja. That doesnt make sense. So i request the producers to make a real-study on the bikes and make some improvement. Only this one got me annoying..

title: Timeshift burst
description:
Upgrade your camera phone experience with Timeshift burst. It's so intelligent that it captures 61 frames* within just 2 seconds – starting even before you press the camera key. This application is perfect for action shots of moving subjects!

Timeshift burst is easy to use:
1. Start your camera and set it to Timeshift burst mode
2. To capture any scene, just press the camera key
3. 61 thumbnails will show up on your screen
4. Swipe the thumbnail images to move back and forth in time of the burst
5. View all frames in a burst sequence by selecting the Timeshift icon on the lower right hand side of a Timeshift burst photo

Now you can save individual images from Timeshift burst viewer**! Save images separately and share them. They are still in your device even after deleting original Timeshift burst images.
* Some devices capture 31 frames due to the hardware limitations.
** The menu to select/share images is only available if Timeshift burst images are viewed in Album.

comments: This can be useful for photographers. It's free and you don't have to spend so much money buying yourself a new camera.
My xperia c5 ultra has this, you can select the best picture. It captures 60 pictures at click you need to delete the rest. This is very useful to take pictures of children.

I like this app , but since my phone updated i lost it , google play shows its installed , but i can't find it on my phone , i really would love to use it again , taking pics of lighting is awesome using this feature , 3 stars cuz i love it but i can't use it any more , why ?
Why doesn't this app save to external storage by selection or copy automatically?
App is awesome, BUT! DOESN'T WORK after last system update... When I open application, it closes immediately :/ Please resolve this issue! Until it works, it was great! I want to use it again...

title: Canva: Graphic Design, Video Collage, Logo Maker
description:
Celebrate Halloween online! 🎃🔮👻Show off your costumes with our wicked Instagram story and Facebook post designs. Or post a spooktacular greeting and go online trick or treatin’ with our chilling invitations, posters, and flyers.

---
Canva makes design and video editing amazingly simple (and fun)! 🙌 Create stunning logo & poster designs with your photos and videos—even if you’re not a design expert!

A versatile free graphic design app: full editor, Instagram story maker, video maker, video collage creator, logo maker and poster maker, book creator & mood board creator — Canva is the ultimate editing app.

Design your Instagram Highlight cover, Instagram Story or no crop posts, create a logo and banner for social networks: Facebook, Pinterest and Twitter. You can also make birthday invitations & wedding invites. 

Stay on brand with our logo creator or logo designer for your business cards, posters or Instagram posts. Available on your phone & computer to jump back into your design anytime, anywhere.

How to Use Canva
1. Start from scratch or a ready-to-use design
Create a design with our blank canvas, or save time and use any of our 60,000 FREE templates created by professional designers, including a logo & video. No need for a tutorial or to hand draw designs. Use our logo designer & logo maker, poster and video editor tools for your masterpiece. 

2. Use the perfect image
Upload pictures and videos from your device gallery, or pick from our library of premium photos & illustrations to make the perfect logo, poster and video.

3. Edit & add text to photos or videos
Easily add quotes or multiple text to any graphic. Change font (we've got 500+ options!), size, color, spacing, and position.

4. Edit pictures like a pro
Use our free image editor to apply photo filters, change brightness, add vignette, and more.

5. Show it off to the world
Share designs directly to Instagram, WhatsApp, email, or simply save to your device.

Use Canva for Social Media
• Create a memorable instaquote with the Instagram Highlight cover, Instagram highlight icons maker, and Instagram story maker
• Create Facebook Posts & Facebook Covers
• Design Pinterest & Twitter banners & thumbnails + video editing app for Youtube
• Make cards, evites, photo collages & use Canva as a picture maker, poster creator or logo creator for all social media 

Use Canva for Everything
• Logo designer, book cover, blog design for any project
• Evites for any event: birthday card maker, wedding invitation maker, evite creator
• Simple, free image editing app
• Photo collage maker, flyer maker, banner maker for any occasion
• Design motivational quotes and humorous memes
• Stunning Instagram Story templates
• Free Instagram video and movie maker editor; edit video templates
• Party invitation maker, school poster maker, video banner maker
• For business: logo editor, brochure, resume, presentation, promo poster maker

Create Designs Quickly
Use Search to find templates faster. Type your theme: "birthday card," "baby photo collage, "sale flyer," “save the date card,” "music poster maker," "beauty social media post," more.

Collaborate on Canva
Create a free team to easily share & edit designs with friends or colleagues. Work together on presentations, business cards, brochures, & other design needs. Upgrade to Canva Pro to set your brand colors & upload brand fonts.

Canva Makes You Look Good
Use Canva as an invitation creator, poster creator, logo maker, online invitation maker, business card maker. Add a video to your next Instagram Story to make it come to life!

---
Follow @canva on Instagram for design tips. Got feedback? https://canva.me/android/

Permissions:
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Add images from your photo gallery.
CAMERA/WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Take a photo in the app & store designs in your gallery.

comments: Where are the functions of editing pictures such as merger of photos, opacity, embossing etc etc. My devise has Canva since a long time but I didn't try. Today I decided to see what Canva offering different to other creative Apps and Im disappointed to see there's not much we can do to create something amazing. Even the basic editing functions like frames, borders, choice of fonts, alignments etc are missing. Or perhaps, I may be unable to find those functions, any help would be much appreciated

I was totally enjoying the app so much! I was using it pretty much everyday between computer and phone until the last update. That just messed everything up. I really hope you guys bring back the editing functionality between computer and phone. I'm still paying my subscription to not fully use it anymore.

Meh, or if you like subscription services ... There are free items, but at least on my screen the "free" is so tiny, so it is hard to easily find free items- and this was just trying it out. I also had to create an account to do so... I used a non free background , and to save it would cost 1.99 or signing up for a "free" 14 day trial, which by the way if you forget to cancel,the monthly and yearly fees are hefty-$14.99 and $119.99 I think it said. Maybe if you have an expense account?

Samsung Tablet Unfriendly (Tab S7). When installed this app via Play Store, it won't go to Landscape mode. When installing this app via Galaxy Store, the design layouts are always wrong. BUT when viewing the same design on browser or Canva app downloaded from Play Store, it looks properly aligned. When design is downloaded, it looks proper, too.

A really great platform to create simple visuals. Plenty of options and easy to work with. I use the paid version and the only thing that's a huge minus is that from mobile I can't access the photo folders that I have created on my computer, meaning from mobile I can use only photos on my phone. Another annoying bug is if I search for photos in my phone folders and select one to be used in a pre-made template, it sometimes doesn't save the photo in the template and I gave to look for it again.

title: Retrica - The Original Filter Camera
description:
Retrica es el punto de partida para conseguir unas fotos excelentes con más de 190 filtros seleccionables con los que añadir efectos. Agrega efecto vignette, granulado o desenfoque para conseguir ese ambiente retro en tus fotos y videos. Toma fotos y videos con filtros y efectos en tiempo real o edítalos desde el álbum de tu teléfono.

La suscripción Premium te brinda acceso exclusivo a un conjunto de filtros en continua actualización. Suscríbete una vez y consigue acceso ilimitado. ¡Univisium es el último filtro Premium que puede hacer que tus fotos y videos se vean como películas de los años 60! ¡Incluye también la relación de aspecto de 2:1 y el efecto trama!

Consúltanos por correo electrónico a contact@retrica.co. Respondemos todos y cada uno de los correos electrónicos de manera personal y rápida.

comments: This app, I had been using for past 3years, I simply loved this app, when I wasn't using the updated version of it,in my old kit kat phone,. But the moment, I switched on my new device,my favourite filters seems to be missing, filters like-azra, Sora... seems to be missing. I hope, I may get my above favourite filters,in next update.👍 Trust me retrica, I will be back and would be giving 5stars.

I use to love it but right now all the pictures come out fuzzy/static-y . And I know it's not my lens because in my normal camera app the pictures turn out crystal clear. Not sure if its just the app reacting badly to my phone or what but its practically unusable right now :(

i absolutely love this app!!!! but they could of had 5 stars if the flash could just work, when i want to take a photo in the dark, you cant see anything, and when n put on the flash, it just doesn't work?

It is amazing app but when i am editinh my photos in retrica and saving them .. there is a blank picture instead of the saved picture .. please let me now the solution .. also its focus and clarity is not that good

This retrica camera is very good and beautiful, but whenever we take a picture in it, it gets worse, my company is requesting that the problem be corrected as soon as possible so that its fans enjoy it.

title: Candy Crush Soda Saga
description:
Download Candy Crush Soda Saga for free now!

From the makers of the legendary Candy Crush Saga comes Candy Crush Soda Saga! Unique candies, more divine matching combinations and challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and fun!

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Show your competitive side in the Episode Race! Compete against other players to see who can complete levels the fastest and progress the quickest. Or work as a team in the Social Bingo feature where players work together for Sodalicious rewards!

Candy Crush Soda Saga Features:

🍭  Over 3000 match 3 Sodalicious levels

🍭  All new game modes bubbling with fun and unique candy:

Soda – Switch the bottles and match candies to release purple soda to save the Candy Bears

Frosting – Match candy to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free

Honeycomb – Match candies next to honeycomb to release the trapped Candy Bears

Jam – Spread the jam across the board

🍭  All new candies and scrumptious new matching combinations:

Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish!

Match 7 candies for the all new Coloring Candy!

🍭  Explore juicy new worlds and levels with even more characters!

🍭  Social Bingo

🍭  Episode Race

🍭  Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush looks even tastier!

🍭  Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

🍭  Players that Facebook Connect will have access to leaderboards where you can challenge your friends and compare your highscores!

🍭  Easily sync the game between devices to unlock the games full features when connected to the internet

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

🍭 Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

🍭 Players that Facebook Connect will have access to leaderboards where you can challenge your friends and compare your highscores!

🍭 Easily sync the game between devices to unlock the games full features when connected to the internet

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

comments: Constantly crashing...... this app would allow you the odd video for a booster or extra few moves, but every video link crashes the app which means you lose where you were, and can't progress anywhere. I get the whole idea is to encourage you to buy etc, but the app should still function. Really tempted to just give up. Shame, had been a good boredom buster up to this point.

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the best and fun game i've ever played...it has so so many levels that you can play...some are hard and some are easy to play...i really never thought that i could play this game as i'm playing it now..level 920 isthe hardest level in the game but is fun to play it again and again...

I used to enjoy the game. But, as you progress the levels, the fish are of no use. It seems like they deliberately go to the wrong places when you are in the final moves of any hard level. This leads to the loss of streak as well. Why are the fishies acting all weird?!!

At first is a interesting game, but once you've got to hard level, became really bad and boring for that reason your lucky that i give you 1 star. ..but I won't spend my money buying, life's, this game really this game really sucks cause freeze every time once you reach higher level. ..fix the problem if you're charging all those gifts..what about golden reward? I I hate it when I get to higher level past 100 it freezes and I have to uninstal the game..

Its like when you are playing the game, it wants you to use their moves, which may be way up at the top of the board., and its ludicrous to use their moves, that they are trying to make u use. Thats using up your tries. Makes no sense to use their moves suggestions. And if you don't use their suggestion, they make it difficult to try your own moves, it will get stuck until u use their moves. Almost said their dumb suggestions, because they want you to fail. I earned 13 gold bars, r gone. .

title: Cookie Jam™ Match 3 Games | Connect 3 or More
description:
Over 100 million people are playing our deliciously sweet match 3 games! Cookie Jam is filled with thousands of fun and challenging candy puzzles! Match 3 cookies & candy in order to clear the board and beat the cookie puzzle! Cookie Jam match 3 games are free to play and tons of fun! Play now!

Candy matching reimagined in this sugary connect three game
Welcome to a match 3 saga of tasty candy puzzles and jelly games. Blast through dessert themed islands and help Chef Panda crush cookies before they crumble in Cookie Jam - the SWEETEST match 3 game online! Play thousands of candy puzzle games for free, with new puzzles every week so you never run out of challenging jelly games to play!

Swap candy colored treats and crush delicious cookies and cakes. It’s no wonder people say Cookie Jam is the BEST MATCH 3 GAME EVER! We have thousands of match 3 games and candy puzzle games to enjoy! Each cookie puzzle comes jam-packed with candy matching fun and jelly matching thrills!

Chef Panda has an order to fill and you can help. Connect three or more treats to fill orders and push through levels in this relaxing swapping game. Match 5 treats to wipe the board clean with a powerful cake crush booster. Discover countless new levels and collect awesome boosters in the ultimate match three game online.

KEY INGREDIENTS:
🍪 Free to play cookie matching fun for everyone!
🍪 Never-ending fun with THOUSANDS of unique levels with new ones added weekly
🍪 Deliciously sweet supply of candy crushing power-ups and combos
🍪 Swap, crush, and jam your way through fantastical bakery themed islands
🍪 Earn rewards and sweet prizes with limited-time events
🍪 Connect to Facebook to seamlessly sync across multiple devices and challenge friends!

LIKE: https://www.facebook.com/PlayCookieJam
FOLLOW: @playcookiejam
DEVELOPER INFO: Jam City is the leading developer in truly cross-platform social gaming! Check out our other free match 3 games and puzzle games! You'll love to swap, match, and crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Check back often to see all the new candy, cake, and sweet treats that we've added! You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your bakery adventure on this free match three game today!

comments: Love the game but shouldn't have to pay for more coins. Should get them on the wheel sometimes. Never do. Free play time clock should stop until you get back to play. Can't play 24 hours straight. I want to, but humanly impossible. Fix that please. Thank you for responding! I got the coins on my last spin. Great! Still need to fix the free play we get. I had several hours but fell asleep before I could play. Lost the remaining time. Please fix that. Thanks!!!!

The constant attempts to sell you more lives and game time is beyond annoying. Also, games seemingly are programmed for you to lose with only one move left, trying to frustrate you into buying more moves. Update: Sure, you don't have to purchase additional game time or moves, but I could also walk from Chicago to New York all without having to pay for gas, bus fare, or a plane ticket. Just like I will eventually arrive at my destination, I will also eventually complete the game level.

I have had this game for awhile, but recently it's become frustrating that lives do not regenerate. I will play at night, run out of lives, and the next morning there are still 0 lives. Sometimes I can restart my phone and it resolves, other times, nothing works. It's only a fun game when you can actually play it. :(

Used to love this game, until it became a money eater. Not really as much fun now, especially since the pandemic, when I don't have the extra money, try to play for a stress reliever, Not more stress. Now won't even give daily bonus even if You log in Every Day, when You get so far, it cuts You Off because You won't pay for more, SAD...

Love this game! ❤ ever since update, you don't receive extra spins and always get the same things. You very seldom receive the coins. Now its even harder to win the new air ships. I haven't won a new since July, just not fun like it use to be. Now you have win 30 levels to win an Air Ship. Not fun at all...you do the Cookie walk no coins, and again no extra spins. Really thinking about getting rid of the game. So disappointing.

title: Jigsaw Puzzles Collection HD - Puzzles for Adults
description:
Over 1000 the best stress relief jigsaw puzzles in the app. New funny or mystery free

Features:

- Daily Free Puzzles – enjoy a new free puzzle every day!
- Over 100 packs in the store gallery! Find special bonuses and get more FREE packs with amazing pictures and advantageous offers! Enjoy our regular sale!
- Large selection of categories: Nature, Life, Food (like fruit, bright sweet donut), Holidays, Animal planet (not only fish, dolphin, bird, rabbit, dog, cat and horse but wild animals too), Abstract (different relaxing rainbow patterns), Water, Children’s Play, Art, Landmarks, People, Countries, and Mixes!
- You can download puzzlegame for all family. We have lite picture for baby and popular pattern for adult. There are ones with Disney cartoon princess, epic superhero, dinosaur, cute kitten and puppy, animal zoo for toddlers and preschool kids. Amazing flower and butterfly puzzles for girls and super car puzzles for cool boys. Anime puzzles for teens. White mountain, fantasy waterfall, ocean, fairy tropical forest and other wildlife nature landscape or beautiful city and castles for adult explorer, who want to see all the World.
Special pack for Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving Day, mystery Halloween and other important dates.
- You can find spectacular easy jigsaws for express play and difficult old school classic puzzlegames for real master. 10 levels of difficulty – from simple puzzles for quick play of 12 up to big ones of 440 pieces! Change the size and shape of puzzle pieces, the color of the background and choose whether to do a puzzle with a rotation of pieces or not.
- Create your custom jigsaw puzzles using pictures on your device, your Facebook pictures or photos taken using the apps.
- You can simultaneously solve multiple puzzling games.
- Save all of the top solved puzzles and all the digital puzzles that you are still working on.
- Numerous puzzle achievements to unlock!
- You can collect puzzles while offline
Totally fun jugsaw pazzles are a great way to relax after a hard day and to train your brain. Play these brain games for adults whenever you’d like without all the mess, and puzzle pieces can’t get lost! Free up table space; you need an area no larger than your device!

comments: I give this app 4 stars because I love doing all the puzzles. My frustration with this app is that it freezes more times then any other app I've used, plus it froze for more than a week to where I couldn't get in to play so I had to uninstall and now I have to redo each of the puzzles again and I do about 20 or more puzzles a day so a little frustrated with that part.

I really enjoy your puzzles, and I play them specially when I want to relax, but it freezes up more than once on each puzzle and it becomes frustrating. Please fix the bug as I see I'm not the only one with this issue. I am using an Android tablet to do the puzzles. Hope this helps figuring out why all the freezing up.

Not crazy about the recent update. Game can only be played in portrait mode now, which is awkward. Game opens with puzzle piece size on 42 as the default, which I never use. Game also has glitch now where a puzzle occasionally can't be be completed due to one piece appearing smaller than the others and unable to be dragged and dropped into place...weird. ***Also, even though I paid $9.99 for the Premium version, it runs ads now and they will not refund my money.

I (as many other players) have bought the ad-free version of this game. Ever since the last update, I (as many other players) have been getting ads. The "Restore Purchases" DOES NOT work. Please fix!!!!!!!!!!! or please forward this message to your service team. Thank-you. I used to love this app, playing this to help destress. The ads which I am unable to get rid of is giving me more stress. Sadly, uninstalling this app.

Amazing jigsaw puzzle with an excellent user interface, beautiful graphics and many options. The premium version gives a full screen puzzle Crashing constantly after the layout change update. Reinstalling has not improved performance and my purchased picture packs freeze downloading. The last Android system update has corrected the download and play stability problems. Works great with many new interesting image packages.

title: Farm Heroes Super Saga
description:
The makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga are back with even bigger Cropsies and more switcher fun in Farm Heroes Super Saga! Help the Farm Heroes defeat Rancid and win the Country Show in this adorable match 3 adventure.

The Farm Heroes know Rancid Raccoon is up to his old tricks again and it's up to you to help them defeat him in this puzzle quest.  Grow and harvest the biggest Super Cropsies and stop Rancid from ruining the fun for everyone!

Adventure through this Farmtastic puzzle game while collecting as many Cropsies as you can! Help Fidget the squirrel collect his nuts, harvest adorable Super Cropsies and go on a puzzle quest to meet exciting new Farm Heroes. Be careful on your adventure and watch for Rancid Raccoon, he will pop up and try to stop you when you least expect him...

Farm Heroes Super Saga features:


Match 3 Games - Easy to Play, Challenging to Master
• Fun game with Farmtastic puzzles with new game modes 
• Match 3 games with hundreds of levels for hours of fun! 
• More fruit and veg to harvest; grow the biggest Cropsies and will the Country Show

Farming Fun – Switch, Connect & More
• Switcher gameplay – Match 4 fruit or veg to grow Super Cropsies!

Connect to Online Leaderboards
• Connecting online through Facebook lets you compare scores with friends on the leaderboards and save your farm adventure on mobile and tablet devices

• Connect to the internet to unlock the full game features and keep collecting Cropsies

Take on this Croptastic Saga and help the Farm Heroes bring harmony back to rural farm life in this fun match 3 puzzle game! Defeat Rancid Raccoon’s sneaky plan and grow Super Cropsies!


Download today and start collecting Cropsies!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
https://www.facebook.com/FarmHeroesSuperSaga/
https://twitter.com/farmheroessuper
https://www.youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial
https://www.instagram.com/farmheroessuper/

Farm Heroes Super Saga is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.

If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our terms of service: http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Have fun playing Farm Heroes Super Saga!

comments: Cannot send lives to all of the players they are not showing up in the list. Takes forever when I do send the lives to pull up facebook list. Not sure if it is the game or facebook screwing around with permissions again. Really aggravating. Still having sane problem.Updated phone and game. unable to enter weekly game/contest for over a month. Says try next week...every week.

I was enjoying this game but unfortunately they make you stay on the same level for ages. It's no fun when you come so close to winning then rearrange everything and you lose. I'm might uninstall this game cause it causes more stress than help you to relax and enjoy the game. 😡😡

Its fun but frustrating to a level that I have to restart the game numerous time to update my level since I'm playing between my phone and tablet, even the power ups will not sync! I don't want a gold bar, can't you just let me play the game?!

Been enjoying playing this game for the last few months, but for past couple of days there has been an issue when tapping watch ad for extra moves/free life. Keep being exited out of the game that's why I have dropped 2 stars. Please sort this

Liking the new changes . Still very hard levels. Keep you interested in what's to come. Good game. Fun to play, they're so cute too. Great game... new animals are awesome. I have to think out the moves to get pass the very hard levels.

title: Canon Print Service
description:
Canon Print Service is software that can print simply from the menus of applications that support Android's printing subsystem. It can print from smart phones and tablets using Canon printers connected to wireless networks.

Main features:
- Switching between color and black-and-white printing
- 2-sided printing
- 2 on 1 printing
- Borderless printing
- Stapling pages
- Setting paper types
- Secure printing
- Department ID management
- PDF direct printing
- Printer discovery by specifying IP address
- Recall from the share menu

* Items that can be set vary depending on the printer you are using.

If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 6 or earlier installed:
You need to activate the Canon Print Service for printing using it. The Canon Print Service is not activated immediately after installation. Activate it using one of the following methods.
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.
- Tap [Settings] > [Printing] > [Canon Print Service], and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.

*  If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 7 or later installed, the service is automatically activated after installation.

Compatible printers:

- Canon Inkjet Printers
PIXMA TS series, TR series, MG series, MX series, G series, E series, PRO series, MP series, iP series, iX series 
MAXIFY MB series, iB series, Business Inkjet series
imagePROGRAF PRO series, TX series, TM series, TA series
*Except for some models

- imageRUNNER ADVANCE series
- Color imageRUNNER series
- imageRUNNER series
- Color imageCLASS series
- imageCLASS series
- i-SENSYS series
- imagePRESS series
- LBP series
- Satera series
- Laser Shot series

- Compact Photo Printers
SELPHY CP900 series, CP1200, CP1300

Compatible OSs/Terminals:
- Terminals with Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) or later installed.

recentChanges:
Instructions on using the app can now be viewed by tapping the app icon.
Android 11 supported
Fixed minor bugs
comments: Worst printer app. Very unreliable. Everytime I want to print something it says my printer is not available. 90% of the time it doesn't work. Makes my printer useless. Very frustrating. Not the first time Canon apps have disappointed me. Had the same problem with their camera app. I'll be thinking twice before buying another Canon product. Even if it's a good deal.

Not "quick and easy" or functional... Installed the app. Upon opening the app, a static instructional page is displayed telling me to print from outside the app. Moving on to print a document, I select the canon option that now appears from the list of printers and get a nearly blank screen asking for the printer's IP address (unable to be detected itself from it's WiFi function) Searching Canon's troubleshooting page, I end up printing out a configuration page from the printer's menu, and I type in the IP address from a sheet of paper. The confirmation button stays greyed out. My only option is to cancel and delete the app. Because apparently it's just a waste of time.

I'm disappointed that double-sided printing is not supported. The option is present but greyed out. I raised the issue with Canon support but their unhelpful response was "if the option is greyed out then it is not supported" even though the printer does do double-sided printing when used with other products, just not the Canon Print Service!

The latest update removed functionality of the print service for me and my MG6220. The app/service (which now needlessly forces an icon into the Apps list) no longer automatically finds my printer, and when I try to manually find it by IP address, the app opens a numeric-only keyboard (no way to input decimal points for the address!).

I will Never buy another Canon anything again!!!!! When I first got the pixma it worked pretty good. But ever since August it has a mind of its own! It will print one page then grab 50 pieces of paper at once from the paper tray! The next time it won't print at all. I got the Ivy cliq ( for free) and it works on its own but to try and get it to print pictures from your phone? Forget it. I give up! Done with Canon!!

title: Johnny Trigger - Action Shooting Game
description:
Johnny Trigger – International Man of Mayhem!

Stylish, deadly and smooth as a billiard ball, Johnny Trigger is a man on a mission in this non-stop platform shooter game where the action never ends. 

Do you have what it takes to bring down the underground world of the mafia? “Less talk, more bullets” – that’s Johnny’s motto as he runs, jumps, spins, slides and keeps on shooting till every bad guy’s bitten the dust.

🔥 Trigger warning – Johnny’s on his way! 🔥

⚈ Thousands of levels of murderous mayhem to fight through, each demanding a unique tactical solution and speedy trigger fingers! Johnny never stops moving, so when the bad guys line up in your sights, you’ve got just once chance to get shooting. 

⚈ Be careful not to hit hostages, though. After all you’re the hero of this game, not some crazed killer! Should you accidentally end the life of an innocent civilian, it’s back to square one.

⚈ Hit those hard-to-reach scumbags with the power of physics! Trick shots, ricochets, explosions and gravity are all part of Johnny’s crime-fighting arsenal…

⚈ ...along with guns galore! Cause serious havoc with 57 unique weapons to collect – 11 pistols, 12 SMGs, 9 automatic rifles, 10 superguns 🔫 and 4 Ultimate guns with fearsome capabilities guaranteed to give the bad guys a nasty shock. For the completist, there’s also 5 base guns, 3 bundle guns and 3 VIP guns. Basically, a shedload of guns to collect, cherish and slaughter gangsters with.

⚈ On the subject of sheds, collect keys to unlock Johnny’s 10 awesome base rooms and get hammering to turn them into luxurious hideaways. Turns out our action hero’s quite the handyman in his free time.

⚈ Sweet graphics and a banging soundtrack – Johnny’s world would be a great place to chill if it weren’t for all those pesky gangsters lurking round every corner. Just think how nice it’ll be once you’ve massacred every last one of them!

⚈ More than 20 different stylish skins to help Johnny go undercover in the murky underworld of organized crime, and then blast the living hell out of it!

⚈ Boss battles demand all of Johnny’s wits and sharp shooting as you take down the lords of the underworld in a leaping, spinning storm of bullets.

💣 Looking for action? Here’s Johnny! 💣

Dive straight in and get shooting! Johnny Trigger’s short but immensely satisfying levels make it the perfect action game to fill a short break between meetings, lectures or lessons. And if you’ve got a little more time, there’s so much to collect and a new challenge round every corner.

 So what are you waiting for? Those bad guys aren’t going to beat themselves, you know.

comments: Great for those idle moments at the various jobs I've worked. It's a fun twist of a platform runner type of game. The different gun sounds are also quite entertaining. Not to mention hearing "HEADSHOT" the way the game does it is satisfying. Wouldn't recommend if you're looking for something complex, but other than that I enjoy it.

Honestly, I got bored of this after a while so I deleted it, but I hot it back today and it's just how I remember it. It's a pretty fun game. It's simple but fun. Turn in airplane mode if you don't want any ads but you won't get any skins or free guns. Other than that I'm done rating for now. All in all I think this would be a good download for you

Not a bad game. There's quite a few ads, but that's expected from a free game. Gameplay is repetitive but still fun. My issue is with updates. It's been months since there has been an update to story mode, hideout, or gun skins. There hasn't even been new guns or outfits to unlock in the weekly challenge. It's just hammers to unlock, which is pointless when I already have the hideout built completely.

The game is very fun. The ads are reasonably spaced out, about one every 2-3 levels. The gameplay is fun, and you are able to pick how you want to play. The different guns don't have that much of an impact on the difficulty, allowing you to pick your favorite gun, regardless of how much damage it says it does, because everyone except the occasional boss goes down in one hit.

I like the looks of it, but all the movement is automated. The only thing you do is tap the screen when your laser gets on the targets. If I controlled more of the game, I'd like it better. But the concept and art is on point.

title: Moto Traffic Race 2: Multiplayer
description:
Moto Traffic Race 2: Multiplayer is one of the best racing games. Have fun dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit. 

UPDATE!!! Race against your friends in the new MULTIPLAYER MODE!!!

Race in outstanding Face-Offs and try to earn the respect of your fellow bikers. 

Take your bike and race against everyone in 5 different game modes… day or night!

In the new MULTIPLAYER MODE you can send your friends a challenge or run a quick race against a worthy adversary.

Enjoy the race and share the result in different social networks. Buy either modern high tech bikes or classic bikes and share them too!

Enjoy the fun of driving the most amazing bike models in the world. You can get some custom bikes or even some older classics. Get the best bike money can buy and beat everyone in this amazing bike racing game. 

What are you waiting for? Download Moto Traffic Race 2 now!

Features:
- 5 game modes, including 2 Multiplayer modes
- Over 10 bikes
- 5 Drivers
- Great 3D graphics
- Awesome music
- Endless fun!

comments: Worst ads will make to delete this gaming app from mobile so stop showing the ads. So this is the reason I am giving 1 star for this app. Be happy by this review....
Its a good game i love it ,it makes good money in the game and this game is good by buying moto bikes

The actual game is entertaining and fun. There is a lot more to it than I thought. The main problem I had was the lack of notch support. I am running the game on my Pixel 3XL and some of the screen is cut off. It doesn't hinder the gameplay specifically but it's hard or impossible to see the achievements that pop up for nitro boost. Overall the gameplay is fun, and I've enjoyed it.

I gave this app 5 star, perhaps for the improvement to the game in betterments of graphics, more sports bikes and motoGP racing characters, make bikes' meter console little realistic. Characters needs to lean more in high speed so that it will looks so much better like a real life. Top speed and the breaks are amazing but the handling needs to improve. I think vehicles are too much on the highway. For me Maps are really good, if include isle of Man tt map this will be the best moto racing game❤️
Fantastic game by all standard. I really enjoy playing the game. Including opponents also makes it more competitive. My only problem is the ads and can't play with other users
