recentChanges: v4.5: Fixed some crash bugs in the last update. Thanks for your love of our game!
comments: The arcade game is very challenging. Takes a lot of concentration, which I like. I have changed from five stars to 4 due to the "new game" needs to be moved. I have accidentally hit that more than once and I was on level 65 and had to go all the way back to level 1 again. PLEASE MOVE IT WHERE THE OTHER OPTIONS ARE. THANK YOU, GOD BLESS YOU!

This app cheats badly,. Puzzle level 65 is worst, balls sometimes suspended in mid air attached to nothing and this always happens when a third ball is on its way to a target of two other balls the same colour. It would be much better if the ball aim was accurate. If you don't mind games that cheat against you then this is an ok time passer. Also, there should be a pause button for any interruptions.

This is not a game. I've played this game for years and progressed through the levels, but the current version won't allow the player to win/pass certain levels. It just shuts you down by disallowing placement, never providing a certain color bubble, etc. It just becomes a frustrating experience and is no longer a "game". Too bad, it used to be fun.

Favorite ball shooter ever. I had to sort through all the wannabes to find this game again. Tried some others but none are as satisfying. It's a challenge and it's straight forward. You don't run out of lives, you don't have to buy balls, there aren't all these extra elements. It's ALL about where you shoot the ball.

It's good and addictive but you can't start the game over from the beginning once you get to a level you can't pass. It's infuriating being stuck on an advanced level. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling the game but it still remembers my last level. I just want to start from the beginning

title: Ferns N Petals: Flowers, Cakes, Gifts Delivery App
description:
Online Florist: Flowers, Gifts, Cakes Delivery Anytime Anywhere

Ferns N Petals or FNP is redefining the idea of gifting with its feature packed Android app. You can order flowers, cakes, gifts and much more with a single online florist shop mobile app in your phone. This online gifting store can help you send blooming fresh flower bouquets, yummy cakes, delicious chocolates & chocolate bouquets, soft toys, personalized gifts anywhere in India & abroad. Some of the salient features of FNP app are fast and easy gift finder search, reminder set up, multiple payment options, social logins, pin code finder, midnight/same day/one day/international deliveries, notifications for upcoming occasions etc.

Occasions are truly made memorable by our online flower and gifts FNP app:

• Birthday Flowers, Cakes & Gifts- Send flowers, exciting gifts & mouth-watering cakes to the birthday boy/girl on the same day with our florist app.
• Anniversary Flowers- Make anniversary celebrations a memorable affair with gift ideas from our online flower & cake shop.
• Love & Romance Valentine’s Day Flowers & Gifts- Shower your beloved with exciting flowers, valentine special serenades & gifts on Valentine’s Day through our florist app.
• Diwali Gifts- Make Diwali celebrations of your loved ones special by sending them wonderful gift hampers.
• Congratulations, Good luck, Thank You, Miss You, Housewarming, New baby- Whether it is about offering congratulations or saying thank you, good luck, get well soon or I am sorry to your loved ones, you can buy diverse range of floral bouquets & arrangements for any situation with our Android mobile app.
• Sympathy & Funeral- Express your heartfelt sympathy & emotions to the huge loss by ordering online flowers such as White Lilies.
• Karwa Chauth Gifts- Make the nuptial bond strong by sending gifts to your wife on Karwa Chauth.
• Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Friendship day- Express the endless love for your parents & make your friendship eternal with stunning flowers & gifts.
• Raksha Bandhan & Bhai Dooj- Express your love & emotions to your siblings by gifting them a Rakhi surprise through our app.
• Christmas Wreaths & Gifts- Redefine your home décor with these appealing Christmas wreaths and amazing gifts.
• New Year Flowers & Gifts- Mark the beginning of a new year with wonderful online gifts, gift baskets & flower arrangements from our florist shop.

Variety of Product Types to Choose from on FNP:

• Flowers: Choose from stunning floral bouquets & arrangements that are crafted from a wide range of exotic flowers like roses, lilies, orchids, carnations etc.
• Cakes: Buy exciting cake flavours such as Black Forest, Chocolate Truffle, Vanilla, Butterscotch, Red Velvet, Pineapple, Fresh Fruit, Cupcakes & lot more.
• Chocolates & Chocolate Bouquets- Ditch away the old traditional way of gifting chocolates with these chocolate bouquets and chocolate boxes.
• Personalised Gifts- Make them feel special by shopping personalised coffee mugs, personalized cushions, personalized photo frames, personalized jewellery etc.
• Plants- Go green by gifting good luck plants, green house plants, air purifying plants etc.

Shipping & Deliveries- Ferns N Petals delivers all 365 days with following delivery options: 

• Same-day standard, Morning, Fixed time (you can ask for a specific time delivery) and Midnight delivery – all at just 2 hours’ notice.
• We are also introducing a Super-Fast 60 Minutes Cakes delivery in metro cities from April'17, where the cakes would be delivered in less than an hour.

350+ Cities covered across India: 

Delhi, Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune, Gurugram, Kolkata, Noida, Hyderabad, Chennai, Lucknow, Thane, Ghaziabad, Jaipur, Chandigarh, Ahmedabad, Patna, Dehradun, Faridabad, Kanpur, Indore, Nagpur, Guwahati, Bhopal, Ranchi, Kanchipuram, Allahabad, Baroda etc.

recentChanges:
Welcome to the new improved Ferns N Petals APP.

comments: My experience with this app was very bad. The cake was not at all good, both in presentation and taste. Also the note delivered was hand written, it should be in printed form and even I select the option to not show my name, still they wrote my name. Its been more than 7 days when I raised complaint and still they haven't done anything. I will never order from FNP again.

Till now its best .... Thankyou so much for reaching us to the best !!! Just there is a problem while making a payment!! Please look at the payment process it does get completed on the spot instead of fetching any link in mesaages or emails, or it just works like that !! Thankyou 😊 Hello there, Its an humble request can you please open one of your frenchiese here in dhule maharashtra, i hope you'll consider my opinion ❤

This is an excellent app to deliver gift items to any place at any item. But I dont like the way tickets are addressed. Generally you should close a ticket when the whole issue is addressed. I just see someone just replying to it and it is closed automatically. And there are no app notifications to let us know there has been a reply in the ticket we raised nor for its closure. Though the motive is to provide a better service, this is irritating.

This is one of the best app ever if want to surprise your near and dear one..I was out of town and wanted to make my husband's birthday very special, but i thought without me how it would be possible, but fnp made it memorable. They gave the Beautiful and tasty cake. It was awesome, my husband was very happy i recommend to go for fnp everytime. I missed to add they delivered it before time. Thank u fnp..keep growing 👍

Pathetic app and service. Usually product cost is high and we understand it is for service. But the service is really very very very bad no use of paying high price then usual. FnP has spoiled my special day by informing that service can't be provided before 2 hrs of that occasion whereas I did a advance booking almost 4 to 5 days before. Not gonna recommend this app for its services neither I'll be using it anymore.

title: My Talking Angela
description:
Talking Angela is a virtual pet with a style the whole family can enjoy!

- Players can bathe her, decorate her home and feed her delicious food.

- Angela has a variety of mini games designed to test skill, reflexes and puzzle solving ability.

- Players can collect stylish stickers to collect and swap with other players.

- Angela can select unique outfits from a huge selection of fashion items, including dresses, shoes and makeup. A new makeover whenever she wants!

- She can even learn cool dance moves to her favorite songs. Whether it’s ballet, K-pop or disco - Angela takes to the stage and makes some magic!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE AND START PLAYING MY TALKING ANGELA NOW! MAKE HER A SUPERSTAR!

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 Limited has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child’s personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

My Talking Angela offers users an exclusive monthly subscription, allowing access to exclusive additional gameplay features, as an optional in-app purchase.

The Captain Cute monthly subscription – which offers the Captain Cute outfit, the option to resume playing 4x per mini-game session, and unlimited energy for playing mini-games – is priced at $4.99 per month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews every month unless it is canceled any time before the end of the current subscription period. When you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will apply from the next subscription period onwards. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your Google Play Account settings after purchase. Please note that deleting the app does not result in cancellation of your subscription.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct users to other apps and Outfit7's websites
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchase using real money (level progress, games, in-game functionalities, ads)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: This game is filled with ads every few seconds, which is understandable to a point, it's free, but those ads should be appropriate for the target audience of the game. Multiple ads have come up that advertise the keto diet and explain that if you don't go on it your partner will hate you, or that your appearance is the only thing that matters. Others advertise animated characters and zoom in inappropriately on their crotch. This is unacceptable for a children's game!

Angela is adorable! She has cute fashion sense and I've always thought this game is full of good vibes. The mini games are also pretty fun! Just a heads up, there's a lot of ads in this game, but I'm glad the more inappropriate ones don't appear anymore for the sake of its intended audience. To the devs: Minor note as if writing this, her hair in her Halloween outfit sometimes glitches in her sleep.

Great but there's a few glitches. Like the puzzle game. Blocks get stuck at the top half of the screen and you can't move them. The sky high game - you can't get higher that 10 points even if you got all perfects/ even if you watched an ad to keep going. Makeup that you (in game) buy gets removed if you dance with the blue stars and earn temporary makeup. After a day, Once the temporary makeup ends, the other makeup gets removed even if you didn't use the temporary makeup. Pls fix ♥️

This game is very good,relaxable,enjoyable and many good things about this game I love this game so much ,,,but Can you please fix the bugs. When l go to store to buy sticker for watch ad (data off) and when l turn on the data it will show that 20 diamonds. I RECOMMOND THE INSTALLERS THAT PLEASE DOWNLOAD THIS FOR ENJOY, EXICTMENT, RELAX AND FEEL GOOD

This game is very good there is one problem reason for 4 stars. Every time I went out and went back in then it kept on saying go to the previous game or start a new game then every time I went to the previous game it made me start everything overeverything like the sleeping and they're eating and applying and the dancing went to 0%

title: Sankara Eye Hospital
description:
“World class eye care with a social impact” – that is how the Sankara Eye Hospital can be profiled. 
Sankara Eye Hospital, Unit of Sri Kanchi Kamakoti Medical Trust is a Super specialty eye hospital committed to provide quality eye care services to all. Started as a small primary health care centre in the year 1977 by Dr R.V. Ramani and Dr Radha Ramani, today Sankara is one among the largest and fastest growing social enterprise managing 11 super specialty eye care hospitals across India.
Sankara Eye Hospital is a protagonist of National Eye Health Care Movement in India, continuously transforming the eye care delivery structure through various Eye Care Initiatives across age groups, cutting edge technology, scientific approach, innovation, research & training.  43 Years of track record in eye care is something which Sankara Eye Hospital is proud of. Performed more than 22 lacs surgeries till date. Recipient of numerous awards, to name a few – Global Performance Excellence award for quality healthcare services IMC Ramakrishna Bajaj National Quality Award, IAPB Regional achievement Award and Ruby Healthcare Award, 
Our hospitals are equipped with the state of the art technology with the most modern facilities, highly skilled and knowledgeable full-time dedicated specialists and highly motivated staff. Eye Care services at Sankara is committed to clinical excellence and personalized and best patient care at all times to all. 
Sankara offers super speciality eye care services for Cataract, Cornea, Glaucoma, Diabetic Retinopathy, Refractive surgery (LASIK), Paediatric Ophthalmology & Strabismus, Vision therapy and Orbit & Occuloplasty. Our specialists work closely together to understand and address each patient’s needs. From a routine vision examination to LASIK Eye Surgery, at Sankara you can be sure of ‘Eye Care Beyond Compare’.

Our hospitals are equipped with the state of the art technology with the most modern facilities, highly skilled and knowledgeable full-time dedicated specialists and highly motivated staff. Eye Care services at Sankara is committed to clinical excellence and personalized and best patient care at all times to all.
Sankara offers super speciality eye care services for Cataract, Cornea, Glaucoma, Diabetic Retinopathy, Refractive surgery (LASIK), Paediatric Ophthalmology & Strabismus, Vision therapy and Orbit & Occuloplasty. Our specialists work closely together to understand and address each patient’s needs. From a routine vision examination to LASIK Eye Surgery, at Sankara you can be sure of ‘Eye Care Beyond Compare’.
summary: Sankara Eye Hospital is a NABH certified Super specialty eye hospital.

title: Mobile Security, Antivirus & Cleaner by Lookout
description:
Lookout Mobile Security and Antivirus provides premium mobile security and identity protection for all of your mobile devices. 

Lookout is now the only all-in-one security & antivirus app that protects your mobile device, your data and your identity. Stay ahead of any virus with our antivirus features, phishing attacks or other mobile theft breach with the Lookout Mobile Security & Antivirus app.

We’re excited to introduce Safe Wi-Fi and System Advisor, two brand new security features to keep you and your personal data safe and secure.

Safe Wi-Fi
Protects your mobile data from phishing and other Wi-Fi attacks. Get peace of mind as you connect to Wi-Fi networks on the go, knowing that your connection is safe and secure.

System Advisor
Checks your device for root detections to make sure the operating system on your device is working properly.

Lookout Basic Includes:
► FREE Mobile Security & Antivirus
► App Scanning: Continuous, over-the-air antivirus protection from viruses, malware, adware, and phishing
► NEW! System Advisor: Checks your mobile device for root detections to make sure the operating system is working properly
► FIND MY PHONE
► Locate & Alert: Map the location of your device and make it sound an alarm - even on silent!
► Signal Flare: Automatically save your device’s location when the battery is low

Lookout Premium

► Includes all the functionality of Lookout Basic, plus additional mobile security & antivirus features to protect your mobile device, data and privacy. 
►NEW! Safe Wi-Fi: Be alerted when a Wi-Fi network you join is dangerous or under attack
►Breach Report: Get timely alerts whenever a company, app or service you use has a data breach along with how best to secure your data 
►Theft Alerts: Get an email with a photo and location whenever suspicious behavior is detected that could mean your identity has been stolen
►Safe Browsing: Scan every URL link you visit to help detect online threats with antivirus technology and alert you of sites that can infect your device and steal your personal information
►Privacy Advisor: See what personal information can be accessed by your apps
►Lock & Wipe: Remotely lock your device, post a custom message and erase your data

Lookout Premium Plus comes with all of the Premium functionality, plus identity theft protection.

LOOKOUT IDENTITY THEFT PROTECTION
► Cyber Watch: Monitor your personal and financial information and get alerted whenever anything is found exposed online
► Social Security Number (SSN) Watch: Get a history of names, addresses, and other records associated with your SSN and proactive notifications of changes.
► Social Media Watch: Protect your online reputation and monitor your social media accounts. 

IDENTITY RESTORATION & INSURANCE
► 24/7 Restoration Assistance: In the event of identity theft, certified ID Restoration Experts are available 24/7 to assist with the time-consuming process of recovering and restoring your identity
►$1M Identity Theft Insurance: Premium Plus subscribers are backed by Identity Theft Insurance that covers up to $1M in damages and legal fees with $0 deductible**
► Lost Wallet Recovery: If your wallet is lost or stolen, restoration experts will work quickly with you to contact document issuers to cancel and reorder credit cards and identification contents

About Lookout Inc.
Visit our website https://www.lookout.com to learn more about us and our mobile security, antivirus and identity protection products.

Note: This app uses the Device Administrator permission. This app uses Accessibility services.

Insurance coverage is provided by a third-party and is subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions of the insurance policy available at www.lookout.com/legal. Lookout is not a licensed insurer or insurance agent.

comments: Great App it works in the background and this appears to be done randomly. I say that because every so often I will get a report on my phone stating the number of Apps which are safe. Last report I had 518 Apps I didn't realise I had that many Apps! I feel secure with Lookout running in the background and you can do a manual scan whenever you want to. All this is free unless you want to go one better with Lookout Premium. I have thought about maybe moving to Lookout Premium with all the scams.

Constantly crashes. Please do something about this. I have sent many feesback reports and still no help. I really like the app but i dont want to waste my money and time on an app that does not work. I also think someone is monitoring my phone and I can not receive messages from certain people. Please help. Update Oct. 30, 2020:: When I tried to go to the link you gave me, I was redirected to ebay. WTH

I have the full version of this app, so it doesn't contains ads. Additionally, I'm running the app on a Samsung Galaxy S9+, with no problems! It has already helped me to find my device several times, (as I have misplaced it several times, or simply forgotten where I placed it)! However, you should know that the location, lock, and wipe your phone doe come as a built in features of the basic Google suite that comes with your Android phone! I got this app for it's Additional features!

This app is garbage. In about the last 6 years and 3 phones, the scream feature worked only once. The website always says its not going through bc of lack service or permission or it's off but it always goes off like 30 min after I find it myself in an area where it has full service and battery. Would give 0 stars if I could. Giving breach updates isn't "security", working features are. Uninstalled.

I haven't had any negative experiences with this app. I like that it scans apps as you install them and let's you know whether those apps are safe. I also like that it does background scans of all my apps periodically. Overall great app for security.

title: Bike Stunt Race 3d Bike Racing Games - Free Games
description:
Welcome to a new dimension of thrill and adventure, the definitive bike racing experience. Join the forces of millions of users who love to simulate bike games and want to become bike riders with ‘Bike Stunt Tricks Master’. Compete with them in the new multiplayer mode of bike race. Contest in real bike stunt championship multiplayer mode and become the champion of bike games. Bike stunt tricks master is the ultimate free mobile game available on play store. Bike stunt game is available with upgraded bikes and crazy riders. Make the most out of our game and become the pioneer of racing games. On popular user demand Bike stunt game now comes with localized languages.

Become the tricks master: 
Dominate the arena of bike race by performing stunts in racing 3D game. Bike race game made special with unique stunts and challenges in racing games. Become one of the best mobile game users who can perform unique stunts. Put on the helmet, start your motorcycle and become a part of this bike race game adventure. Helmet is crucial and decides your fate in motor bike stunts, you will know it by the end of the game. Moto games adventure is now easily accessible on the screen of your smartphone. Simulate bike driving in one of the best offline games.

Biking Adventure: 
Real bike race scenarios brought to life with unique challenging tracks and a realistic environment. Brand new updated environment depicting real life tracks in our Racing games. Racing games carry multiple levels from easy trials to the path of perseverance. Are you motorcycle racer? Let’s ﬁnd out. Use your motorcycle driving tricks to conquer the tracks. Ultimate bike stunt and water games in this moto simulator bike race game. Bike wala game made special with unique challenges in offline games.

Face the Hurdles: 
Avoid the hurdles and obstacles to pave your path to greatness in bike games. Drive professionally and perform crazy moto stunts to become the perfect stuntman. Learn motorcycle driving tricks to complete the challenging tasks on time. A bike game that makes you forget about all car games, bike race games and other water games with simulation. Become a real stunt man of bike games with this water stunt game. 

Out of the Ordinary: 
Progress through the career of your motorcycle games and aim for maximum stars. Brand new bikes added to bike wala game to perform crazier stunts; choose your bike keeping in mind the grip, acceleration and flexibility. Choose from the best of new fleet of bikes, with customization and up-gradation options. Earn coins by dominating the track and spend them on your bikes. Turn this crazy bike stunts mania into race championship with your passion.

Realistic Bike Racing: 
Bike wala game comes with realistic controls, it is as if you are driving your real stunt bike in bike race! Bike racing game now comes with a garage. Park your collection of bikes and modify them in your very own personal garage. Bike race is no longer boring with a garage all to yourself in racing games. Customize your bike in offline games with your own choice of paint and parts. Bike racing is now more fun in this stunt game. Bike racing game made realistic and fun.
Convenience and Fun:
Play it anywhere, this bike game does not require any Wi-Fi connection as it falls in the category of offline games. You can enjoy racing in the subway, while ﬂying on a plane, in the car, on the road, anywhere! anytime! It’s always going to provide you thrill and fun. Bike wala game is now part of racing games. Make the most out of bike games as they no longer require an internet connection.

Free of Cost: 
In this free game you don’t even have to pay a single penny, just tap to start the stunt game. Bike stunt game available on Google play store. Enjoy the bike racing game, it is a free of cost bike stunt game.

 Age Rating Disclaimer:  Bike racing game does NOT contain violence or any other mature content. It is a user friendly bike racing game.

title: Messenger Lite: Free Calls & Messages
description:
A fast and data-efficient messaging app to reach the people in your life. 

Messenger Lite:
- Installs quickly. It's less than 10MB to download!
- Saves data. It loads fast, runs efficiently and uses less mobile data.
- Works everywhere. Reach people when you're in an area with a slow or unstable internet connection.

With Messenger Lite, you can:
- Contact anyone on Messenger, Facebook or Facebook Lite.
- See when people are active and available to chat.
- Message people one-on-one or in groups to catch up or make plans.
- Send photos, links, or express yourself with stickers.
- Make one-on-one voice and video calls for free over Wi-Fi (otherwise standard data charges apply). Talk as long as you want, even with people in other countries!

comments: Since the last update I am unable to copy a message from messenger Lite. Instead of giving me the copy edit Etc menu it gives me a list of emojis. They've dumbed it down to the point where I can no longer use the new version and I will have to go to one of the mirror sites and load an old version. It's the only part of Facebook I use and they managed to muck it up.

a lot of people are reporting problems with latest update & I see no agent stepping in 2 reply. I have also reached my limit in as far as any updates saying, " Update info not provided by developer". Last update has 2 many problems. After last update, my posts pass fast as if a speil game! When will fb ever learn? If there is no definition for the app. I will not upload it. I have to go to my frigging insights to do an edit on my spiritual angel page! One star is 2 much 2 give.

Please add a message attachments, just like what's App has.... ,and also there is problem when I try to share link, the full link doesn't get generated and when we try to delete the message, it should be delete from both the sides, the sender and receiver side... Please, please, please..... It's a humble request...

Messenger Lite is a good app but it could use a bit more improvements and features. One is that it should have a dark mode option, everyone is wanting it for months now so please do it. Also add the reply function and the option to unsend messages. Lastly, sending a file is such a good feature of the app that also should be added to the main app, but please improve it by retaining the actual file name of the files we send instead of changing it to randomly generated name and numbers. Thank you.

Since the new update It is not working. I have new messages showing, but when I click on the persons name it never loads the message. No messages are showing up. I Am beyond frustrated. Before, I never had a problem viewing my messages and sending them.

title: Pic Collage Maker, Photo Editor - FotoCollage
description:
FotoCollage Photo Editor is a powerful and easy-to-use photo collage maker and photo editing app. Just select some images you love, you can easily put them in a perfect layout, add numerous styles of background, text, sticker and frame to make your pics art, creating unique and awesome collages of your own.

FotoCollage will be your favorite Photo Editor.

Key Features:
● Combine photos with amazing layouts into beautiful collages
● Remix up to 20 of photos to create wonderful layouts and collages
● Change the photo layout, turn your photos into rounded corners
● Photo editing tools, change the sharpness and shadow adjustment
● Make many kinds background to your photos, such as blur background
● 37 unique photo effects for making unique photo collage
● Stickers, tags, emojis, texts, tens of  photo borders and frames
● Rotate, mirror, flip images, drag or swap them, pinch to zoom in or out
● Emojis and tags make your photo more stylish
● Turn your pics into art with perfect filters, effects and photo editing tools

⭐ 100+ layouts
There are 100+ popular design templates in fascinating pic collage tool. By these templates you can mix up to 20 images, flexibly create collaged photos and make a shape collage, such as heart and diamond. Show your style with your attractive collages!

⭐Text
You will enjoy features of font sizes, color, gradient, outline, shadow, space, background edition in a free manner. Insert words anywhere in the collage in a bid to record your wonderful mood, share experience, and make the collaged photos look high-ranking.

⭐Emoji Stickers
Enjoy 500+ funny stickers which can lending a festive touch to your photos , and they are updated in line with the latest fashion. Besides, there are a variety of amazing Makeup stickers, such as neon, muscle, wing, hair and so on. Try emoji or selfie makeup stickers on your collage, and you will love it.

⭐ Background & Pattern
You can choose variety kinds of cute pattern as background, such as love, dot, xoxo, texture and so on, you can adjust their opacity, space, size and angle. 
Subvert the traditional dull and boring styles, these lively background make your photos look high-end. You can also add solid color & blur & gradient color background which can make your collage elegant.

⭐Filter with Advanced Looks
Photo Filter can revolutionize your photos with one tap. Lots of great filter effects can make people, pets, foods in your pics looks perfect. Besides, you can adjust the details of brightness, contrast, warmth by yourself. Hope you will love them.

⭐ Graffiti Brush
Enjoy FotoCollage with cool customizable brushes. Doodle on pictures by a good many of brush types and get surprise effect, including enriched colors and adjustable strokes, such as pattern, solid lines, dotted lines, fluorescent brushes, decorative brushes.

By FotoCollage photo editor, make your own perfect photo collage with a wide variety of layouts/stickers/frames/backgrounds, Become the focus of attention among friends in TikTok, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook etc. Try it and have a wonderful time with FotoCollage!

Enjoy making amazing photo collages and edit your photos with the best FotoCollage!
If you have any suggestion, feel free to contact us: photocollage.feedback@gmail.com.

Great!! I love this app. It has everything I need. Thank you for making this app. Keep it up.👍♥️ Ok. But can u add make up stuff like to asjust hair color,skin tone , withen teeth , lipstick and so??

title: MakeupPlus - Your Own Virtual Makeup Artist
description:
Say hello to your own personal makeup artist! Our MakeupPlus app gets you looking gorgeous with a few easy touches. We've worked with industry professionals such as top makeup artists and photographers to create a personal makeup and beauty advisor for you. There's no easier way to try out new looks or create your own signature look! Our MakeupPlus camera lets you try on complete looks then mix and match with fun accessories. Touch up your features, glam-up with our makeup looks, and purchase the products you love to recreate your favorite looks in real life – you can easily do it all with MakeupPlus.
EXCLUSIVE looks created by beauty industry's best
+ Try out exclusive makeup looks created by the beauty industry’s top professionals
+ Get an instant makeover by the industry's best makeup artists such as Bretman Rock, Nikkie Tutorials, Lisa Eldridge, Christen Dominique, Angel Merino aka Mac Daddyy and others!
MIX and MATCH full-face makeup looks with fun accessories
Transform how you look right before your eyes with our augmented reality (AR) camera.
+ Instantly preview glamorous full-face makeovers with fun accessories including retro style sunglasses, angel halos and more!
+ Choose from a list of beautifully-crafted looks including a sweet look with "Bella", a whimsical look with "Brazen", or even a dark and sultry look with "Porcelain"
+ Mix and match full-face makeovers with different looks to create your own style
LOVE your look
Consider yourself a makeup guru? Show off your creativity by putting together your own signature look in TOUCH-UP. 
+ If you're feeling bold, try out fun colors to see how you'd look all glammed up 
+ Add easy makeup touches to your selfies to look on-point in every photo you post #dressyourface
+ Go wild and change your hair color to the hottest trends. Try "Cotton Candy", "Sunset", or even "Icy Blue" for a mystic look  
+ Enhance the color of your eyes by adding colorful contact lenses with our easy applicator 
TRY out real beauty products
Take the guesswork out of buying makeup online! With our COUNTER function, you can see how makeup products look in real-time with our AR camera. 
+ Instantly try on products from your favorite brands such as Charlotte Tilbury, GLAMGLOW, Stila, Clarins, NARS, Dior and more! 
+ Like what you see? With the touch of a button, it's yours! You can buy the items you love right on our app and start taking photos to show your friends
BEAUTIFY your photo to enhance your natural features
+ Retouch your skin to bring out your naturally radiant glow
+ Easily show off your best features by making minor adjustments to your face, eyes, chin or nose
ADDITIONAL features
+ Discover easy-to-follow makeup tips to make the most of our camera and makeup application tools in TRENDING
+ Take the best group photos with our selfie timer and multiple face recognition function
+ MakeupPlus works with both your front and back camera so take your pick! 
SHARE your photos
Once you're satisfied with your look, MakeupPlus makes it easy for you to download or share your photo on popular social media sites such as Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter! 
Share your photos and feedback with us!
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/makeupplusofficial
Twitter: @makeupplusapp
Instagram: @makeupplusapp
Device compatibility
Most MakeupPlus features are compatible with most devices. However, our AR feature requires at least 1GB of storage space and a minimum resolution of 480 x 854. If your device does not meet these specific requirements, the AR feature will not be available.

comments: I keep getting "Face undetected". Usually before the update even if the face is undetected, there's a manual arrangement of eyes and lips but now there's none. Please get the manual feature back because sometimes it's just a matter of the photo's quality which causes a bit of a blurriness. I've been a loyal user of your apps since 2018, don't let me down now.

All of a sudden this is saying "face not detected" and then forcing you out. There is a manuel way to select a face so I don't understand why it's doing that all of a sudden. Please fix!!! This used to be my fav editing app!

App is sketchy, it opens randomly and keeps giving pop-up notifications that it's closing, even if I haven't opened it in months. It has access to things it shouldn't have access to. There are breaches in the app constantly which have stolen my passwords and debit card information right off my banking app.
love this app but after the update the face will have spots its so noticeable even if i put filter fix this i already installed & uninstalled it twice but its just the same 😭

As soon as I tap on the app, it says it isn't responding. I have Uninstalled, reinstalled and cleared the cache and data. Its been going on since yesterday. I will be switching to another app if this isn't fixed.

It is a special game in different genres of piano games and wonderful gameplay.

It’s similar to other piano games, just tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles. That's all !

comments: You really need to put in less instrumental songs and more songs with words. Most of these songs are like fast paced lullaby songs. Need more songs that have a good beat, are English, and have words in the songs. Also a few more songs that start off a bit slower for beginners.

This game is just horrible. It's slow, it's lags, the adds are constant, I had to play airplane mode and it still lagged. The music gets drowned out by the vibrations and the app overall is just ugly. I'm not sure what happened here but it's honestly not worth the time and energy to even download.

*sigh* I have to take a quick break from this game because it's so addictive! But the only problem I have is about the amount of ads shown literally whenever you do ANYTHING! It's getting irritating. Please do something to shorten the amount of ads. Please please please! I love this game but the ads make me want to delete it. :-) thank you for taking my comment into consideration.

This game is amazing but, It missed out on a star as the songs are mostly covers and not the original song and I don't like it as (not to be rude) I sometimes cant hear the singers or they are singing the wrong lyrics. Other that that, this is a very good game :)

I'll give you two stars for only one reason.Just one , ADS!!!!.I mean like everything is literally based on ads , If you want to try out a new song ,ADS.When you finish the song ,ADS.When you hit the wrong key , ADS when you loose ADS.LIKE SERIOUSLY THOUGH,Try to find a way to minimize the ads .Apart from that everything else is good.I was so irritated by those ads I had to uninstall the app just to have a wonderful day. Try and consider myrequest infact everyone is telling the same thing 😓😥

title: Calls Blacklist - Call Blocker
description:
"Calls Blacklist" is both a call blocker and an SMS blocker. It can easily block calls and messages from unwanted, private (hidden, anonymous) or unknown numbers.

SPAM BLOCKING:
If you are tired of annoying calls or messages: telemarketing, spam and robocalls, then "Calls Blacklist" is your solution. It is very easy and lightweight, yet powerful call blocker.
The only you need is to add unwanted numbers to the blacklist.

SMS MESSENGER:
This app also provides fully functional built-in SMS messenger.
You can easily send, receive and manage SMS. Also you can manage conversations and block SMS spam using only one app. Once you enabled SMS blocking, the app's built-in SMS messenger become available. 

BLACKLIST:
You can manage all unwanted numbers, and even more - using this app you can block spammers by text of messages. And of course, it is easy to save blacklisted numbers to the file and import them on another device.

recentChanges: - Bugs fixed
comments: This app works great. My phone has a call block function, but, as soon as you delete the call history, it lets the calls through again, and I got tired of that real fast. This app keeps blocking unwanted calls, even if I delete my call history, and it's easy to block new spam calls. I would recommend this app to a friend, or family, that wants to block spam calls.

Works perfectly. I moved from one state to another, and I'm constantly spammed with calls coming from my previous area code. I was able to block the entire area code (just make sure to include the country code), and it blocked 10 calls in one afternoon. It also logs the blocked numbers, which was helpful because I forgot to whitelist someone from my home state, saw that she called, and whitelisted her. I honestly cannot recommend this app enough. It feels like I finally have some control.

It's so annoying to get telemarketers calling 20 times a day. This app takes care of that! I had used this app a few years ago, and with an OS update it went all wonky, blocking calls from my contacts and allowing spam calls. They have fixed that problem. The only problem I have with this app is it still allows the unwanted calls to come through; however, it does not ring, so you're not disturbed.

Yes I like this app, profoundly so. Thank you for providing this excellent service. The app it self is easy to use and navigate, everything is explained in a clear and concise manner. I do work nights only, and got tired of being disturbed repeatedly by spam/scam/robo calls. I do sincerely believe those people who cause or make those calls need to find real jobs that provide an actual service to society. I am grateful, now I can rest more than 4-5 hours a day. So thanks.

The app works great. Since I've installed it, I haven't had to deal with a single spam call. Now when the phone rings, I know it's one of my contacts rather than spam. The SMS part is a little underdeveloped, but that's a minor quibble and it doesn't have to be used anyway. Overall, terrific app.

If you are a fan of space shooting, you must like it! More spaceships to choose and cool appearance, differ airplane have unique barrage, upgrade the spaceship with stronger power.

comments: Okay I'm still trying to want to continue playing this game but I'm starting to want to quit. The gems PVP is horrible! Again I'm in first then lose in the end. How is that?! Also you have not expanded the levels, what gives? In others words where's the updates and will Ivy reply to me? Obviously I'm not important enough to reply back to and this team of people don't seem to care enough about this game to update it. 😡

The game bosses are surprisingly difficult to beat at first and gets insanely hard to near impossible to beat afterwards without drastically upgrading your spacecraft and by that I mean you must spend lots of time and money. If you are looking to just kill some time then this game should fit in quite nicely but if you are not looking to spend on the game then you'll face a ton of ads which will annoy you eventually. The in-app purchase deals are not so nice by the way.

Terrible, terrible game. The previous versions were epic. The graphics were amazing, the flyships were amazing and the action was unbelievable. Now the game is way too colourful, it looks like it was made for 7 year olds now. Upgrades shop sucks ads are just too much and what on earth did you do with endless mode. This game was epic, now it just sucks.

Use to love this game. Played it daily. However been waiting for new campaigns for over two month now. I am about 30 days from deleting this app for good. Plus Star Trek Command Fleet is occupying my time now. No need to wait for updates to this app.

I quite enjoy playing this game, I finish all levels just waiting for the update, so please update it soon so that my interest on the game will not go low. And yet please why is it that when am playing endless mode when I reached level 80 if I use bomb the game would seized?

title: zomato - restaurant finder and food delivery app
description:
Your safety is our topmost priority. Opt for Contactless Delivery and Contactless Dining to ensure minimum human interaction when ordering in or dining at restaurants. 
……………
zomato is a restaurant review, discovery, and food delivery app, with in-depth information of more than 1.5 million restaurants across 24 countries! 

Serving more than 70 million users monthly, zomato helps them find high-quality food at restaurants through its search and discovery services, and online food delivery in India, UAE, Lebanon and Turkey.

Install the zomato app and plan your next meal by browsing through restaurant menus, photos, ratings and reviews.

*Search for and discover restaurants: Search for restaurants, cuisines, or dishes on zomato! From Pizza, Pasta, Noodles, Biryani, Butter Chicken, Pancakes to Salads, Cakes, Burritos, Burgers, Dimsums, Sushi (..and a lot more) - we’ve got all your cravings covered. 

Use our search filters to discover restaurants near you for breakfast, lunch or dinner (and everything else in between), and refer to our theme-based curated lists called ‘Collections’ to find the best burgers, perfect date spots, or the top trending restaurants in town! 

*View menus and other details: Find restaurant menus, reviews, pictures, contact details, map directions, and all the other essential information you need for your next binge session. 

*Get food delivered (24x7): With online delivery across 500+ cities globally, you can order food and beverages, and get them delivered at your doorstep within minutes. 

*Get groceries delivered: Use zomato market to get your daily essentials, such as fruits, vegetables, dairy, eggs, meats and more, delivered at your doorstep in no more than 60 minutes. 

*Track your orders with ease: Easily track your order journey with live tracking on our app. Get accurate estimates of your delivery time and details about your delivery valet right after placing your order. 

*Rate and review restaurants: Add ratings and reviews for the restaurants you've been to or have ordered in from, and share photos of your foodie moments. Tell us what you liked, disliked, and what can be improved upon. 

*Avail zomato pro: Become a zomato pro member and enjoy discounts of up to 40% on your dining experiences. Also, view your savings with every pro transaction on the app to keep track.

*Book a table to avoid queues: Avoid standing in waiting queues at restaurants by booking a table in advance with zomato. Simply choose a partner restaurant, add the number of guests and select a slot to dine in for a seamless experience.

*Find and follow your friends: With zomato feed, you can find and follow your friends or top foodies to see where they're eating at and what they like best.

zomato is available across India, UAE, Portugal, Australia, New Zealand, the USA, Lebanon, the Philippines, Indonesia, Turkey, the UK, Canada, Ireland, South Africa, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Chile, Italy, Brazil, Sri Lanka, Qatar, Malaysia and Singapore.

*some features are live in limited locations only.

recentChanges:
Our latest app update comes with an exciting new feature! Introducing voice directions* — a simple way for you to make all your delivery experiences even more seamless.

Now help your zomato valet reach your location faster by simply recording voice directions on the cart while placing your order. You can even record these instructions once and save it for all your future orders.

*Live in limited locations only.

Update your app and give it a spin!
comments: Would have given 5 stars, bu for 1) Valet movement is not updated on real time basis in the app and this causes inconveniences. This is not an issue with any random valet for his connectivity issues. The problem persists for all orders. Valet doesn't move at all on the map at times. The issue persists even after latest update. 2) Even after the order is delivered, at the bottom of the main screen, it is displayed as Food is being prepared.

Great app. Lots of filters for ease of use. New update for one star on 30/10/2020. Pathetic approach. I ordered the food. Restaurant was ready with food, but no rider was allocated for an hour. Finally when I contacted customer care, they said sorry and added a credit amount for their mistake. I paid for service, not to get the credit. Finally, the restaurant itself arranged their own driver and sent the food and was never sent by Zomato. Regret to be a Zomato Pro member.

The new UI revamp is refreshing. The notifications and chats are handled well. The payment page fragment design can be improved. One can easily miss the promo section, if its not intentional. I would expect orders to be shown by default than favourites in the orders tab. The order tracking banner is well designed as well. Kudos to the designer.

Unfortunately with the recent changes in benefits of using this app, i stopped using it and membership fees were paid for nothing. Will never use it again simply not worth it. This is what happens when you make people pay for certain benefits of using the app and choose to wipe it all out but reyai the paid by members money.

When I started out new, it was an excellent app for food delivery. But now there are issues happening most of the time I want to order. The menu is not visible to me and it is showing that I can order. Half the time I want to order there is some kind of issue going on like not delivering to my location or switched off ordering but actually it is showing that I can order now. What the hell is wrong with Zomato?

title: AppLock - Fingerprint
description:
✔ Smart AppLock is an AppLocker or App Protector that will lock and protect apps using a password or pattern and fingerprint.

Lock Facebook, Whatsapp, Gallery apps with password and prevent the apps from being exposed by snooper!

✔ In addition to perfect lock, AppLock can catch intruders by taking a picture and even hide the fact that lock the app with fake error window!

The most advanced AppLock! try it now!

--- Main Features ---
▶ AppLock
Lock the app with a password to protect your privacy. e.g) Messenger, WeChat and any apps

▶ Catch Intruders
If someone access your app then, take a picture and send to your email.

▶ Fingerprint 
Supports convenient and powerful lock with fingerprint sensor.(Samsung device or Android Marshmallow)

▶ Fake Lock
You can even hide the fact that lock the app with fake error window.

▶ Notification Lock
Blocks the locked app's notification message in the top notification bar

▶ Scalable Pattern
Scalable pattern size up to 18x18 than the existing simple 3x3 pattern.

▶ Smart Lock
Lock only specific time or auto-unlock when connected to specific WiFi or Blutooth.

▶ Multiple Password
You can set a different password for each locked app.

▶ Home Screen Lock
Lock the whole phone using lock screen of AppLock instead of lock screen of system.

▶ Screen Lock
Prevents the screen turns off when running certain apps.(make use of Internet, E-Book)

--- App Features ---
▶ The first generation AppLock and verified by tens of millions of people to download the app until now.

▶ The app size is just about 3MB and working fast and lightly.

▶ AppLock provide a variety of features and detailed options than simple feature in other app.

▶ Supports 31 languages.

--- Other features ---
· Support PIN, Pattern, Password, Guesture, Fingerprint.

· Easy to lock/unlock using widget and notification bar.

· The user can decorate the lock screen. e.g) change a background the desired photo.

· AppLock supports the ability to reset a lost password.

· You can place the buttons arranged of password randomly.

· Restrict unlock attempts to prevent others continually to attempt to unlock it.

· Supports the ability to lock Incoming Call.

· Supports the ability to lock WiFi, Bluetooth.

· You can auto-lock newly installed apps.

· When running certain apps that can automatically rotate the screen (or vertical fixed).

· Guard private data, privacy and keep security and app protection/safer.

· In addition, it includes more features.

--- FAQ ---
1) How can I prevent AppLock to be uninstalled and delete?
· Please enable 'Uninstallation Prevention' option in settings, then AppLock is never uninstalled.

2) How can I prevent AppLock to be killed by Task Manager?
· Please install Helper, then, Task Manager can't kill AppLock.

3) Is there a feature for forgotten password
Yes, if you set your email or security QnA, you can initialize your password when you forgot password.

4) How can I hide pictures and video?
If you lock Gallery app then, other user can't see your photo and video.

5) Can't run(find) Smart AppLock(or AppLock disappears in App Drawer)
· if you hide Smart AppLock's Icon in options, and then AppLock will disappear. To run it, please put 'Widget' of AppLock in Widget List and click it.

6) Can't uninstall Smart AppLock.
· Please disable 'Uninstallation Prevention' option in Settings before uninstalling Smart AppLock.


AppLock uses the Device Administrator permission.(only used to prevent AppLock being uninstalled)

AppLock uses Accessibility services.

* App Name is changed from Smart App Protector.
descriptionHTML:
✔ Smart AppLock is an AppLocker or App Protector that will lock and protect apps using a password or pattern and fingerprint.

Lock Facebook, Whatsapp, Gallery apps with password and prevent the apps from being exposed by snooper!

✔ In addition to perfect lock, AppLock can catch intruders by taking a picture and even hide the fact that lock the app with fake error window!

The most advanced AppLock! try it now!

--- Main Features ---
▶ AppLock
Lock the app with a password to protect your privacy. e.g) Messenger, WeChat and any apps

▶ Catch Intruders
If someone access your app then, take a picture and send to your email.

▶ Fingerprint
Supports convenient and powerful lock with fingerprint sensor.(Samsung device or Android Marshmallow)

▶ Fake Lock
You can even hide the fact that lock the app with fake error window.

▶ Notification Lock
Blocks the locked app's notification message in the top notification bar

▶ Scalable Pattern
Scalable pattern size up to 18x18 than the existing simple 3x3 pattern.

▶ Smart Lock
Lock only specific time or auto-unlock when connected to specific WiFi or Blutooth.

▶ Multiple Password
You can set a different password for each locked app.

▶ Home Screen Lock
Lock the whole phone using lock screen of AppLock instead of lock screen of system.

▶ Screen Lock
Prevents the screen turns off when running certain apps.(make use of Internet, E-Book)

--- App Features ---
▶ The first generation AppLock and verified by tens of millions of people to download the app until now.

▶ The app size is just about 3MB and working fast and lightly.

▶ AppLock provide a variety of features and detailed options than simple feature in other app.

▶ Supports 31 languages.

--- Other features ---
· Support PIN, Pattern, Password, Guesture, Fingerprint.

· Easy to lock/unlock using widget and notification bar.

· The user can decorate the lock screen. e.g) change a background the desired photo.

· AppLock supports the ability to reset a lost password.

· You can place the buttons arranged of password randomly.

· Restrict unlock attempts to prevent others continually to attempt to unlock it.

· Supports the ability to lock Incoming Call.

· Supports the ability to lock WiFi, Bluetooth.

· You can auto-lock newly installed apps.

· When running certain apps that can automatically rotate the screen (or vertical fixed).

· Guard private data, privacy and keep security and app protection/safer.

· In addition, it includes more features.

--- FAQ ---
1) How can I prevent AppLock to be uninstalled and delete?
· Please enable 'Uninstallation Prevention' option in settings, then AppLock is never uninstalled.

2) How can I prevent AppLock to be killed by Task Manager?
· Please install Helper, then, Task Manager can't kill AppLock.

3) Is there a feature for forgotten password
Yes, if you set your email or security QnA, you can initialize your password when you forgot password.

4) How can I hide pictures and video?
If you lock Gallery app then, other user can't see your photo and video.

5) Can't run(find) Smart AppLock(or AppLock disappears in App Drawer)
· if you hide Smart AppLock's Icon in options, and then AppLock will disappear. To run it, please put 'Widget' of AppLock in Widget List and click it.

6) Can't uninstall Smart AppLock.
· Please disable 'Uninstallation Prevention' option in Settings before uninstalling Smart AppLock.


AppLock uses the Device Administrator permission.(only used to prevent AppLock being uninstalled)

AppLock uses Accessibility services.

* App Name is changed from Smart App Protector.
summary: AppLock 🔒 Protect & Lock Apps, Gallery, Photos, Video, Privacy with fingerprint

comments: This is a great app, but the reason why it got three stars from me is that, the remote control feature doesn't work on my TecnoF1, whever i triy to turn it on, it show "switch on notification access in the next page" and the next page it(this feature is not available in this device). Why is that? But apart from that, nothing is wrong with the app. Thank you!

Although, this is the excellent app lock 🔐, I never got this much of functions in any other app lock, but In my phone 📱 it was always forced stopped/stop running, and I have to restart the application, this is the problem faced by me while using this application. Please try to fix it, if you can as fast as possible. Thanks!

Although it works perfectly on my single screen Samsung Note 10 Lite, sadly it does not work on my dual screen LG G8X. If an app is started from the dual screen, in the main screen it is asking for finger print, while it is already open in the dual screen, and can be used without fingerprint. I think you should look into this matter.

This is a really good app but when I tap on recent apps the messages on the previous apps that I was using are still visible. If someone opens my recent apps that person can read those messages. You guys should hide the app content that is shown in the "recent apps". At least for those apps in which a person can have privacy problems (Gmail, Instagram, WhatsApp)

the app worked well on my previous phone with android 9.0, but now on my new android 10.0 phone the lockscreen takes far too long to appear after selecting an app. it literally waits for the app to load and then shows the lockscreen a split second after the loading screen ends. which is enough time for someone to see what you're trying to hide. someone could potentially screenshot the app in that split second. Please fix this.

title: Norton Mobile Security - Antivirus & Anti-Malware
description:
Norton Mobile Security & Antivirus is an award winning mobile [4] phone security service and virus protection app. This virus detector and remover for androids helps protect your devices against malware, viruses and threats such as malicious apps, theft, and websites designed to steal your information and money. Norton has years of experience in providing anti virus protection for your PC and now it is a trusted name in mobile phone security apps.

Android Security Features (including 30-Day Trial [1])

---------------------------------------------

Did you know that 75% of mobile apps fail basic security tests?
(Gartner report, 2014)

★ App Advisor powered by Norton™ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

★ Android Antivirus: A malware scanner that helps to remove apps that have malware, spyware, or an Android virus that can harm or slow your device. Proactive virus detector, virus cleaner and antivirus protection.[3]

★ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

★ Surveillance App Protection helps protect your online privacy and security by letting you know if an app is sharing your device’s location, contacts, photos, and messages without your authorization.

★ Web Protection offers comprehensive phone security while surfing online to help protect you against visiting malicious and phishing sites.

★ Safe Search: In-app search engine connects to NortonLifeLock’s global threat database to flag unsafe sites right in your search results.

★ Call Blocking allows you to automatically block calls from specific phone numbers or anonymous or unknown numbers (smartphones only).

★ Android System Advisor: Helps scan your device and Android OS to identify points of attack that can leave you exposed to cyber threats

★ Privacy Report Interactive Map shows where in the world apps send personal information and photos



---------------------------------------------

Another trusted app from Norton. Norton Security & Antivirus provides proactive anti-malware, spyware and antivirus protection. This virus detector and remover will ensure that your phone security is as tight as it can be.


[1] SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
For new users without a current Norton Mobile Security with Antivirus subscription. The trial period will last for 30 days so long as the current version remains available on the Google Play.
30-day trial requires activation of annual subscription (see in-app product pricing)
Cancel from this page or within your Google Play account before the end of the trial to avoid payment
After 30-day trial, your subscription will start and renew automatically annually unless canceled
Annual subscription is for one device only
Money-back guarantee: with annual subscription. For refund information, visit support.norton.com
Annual subscription is for one device only
[2] Android multi-user mode is not supported.
[4] AV-TEST, “Best Android Security 2018 Award” for Norton Mobile Security, February. 2019: https://www.av-test.org/en/news/av-test-awards-2017-go-to-symantec/

---------------------------------------------
For feedback and suggestions, visit the support forum: http://norton.com/nms_support

For a detailed list of features, visit: https://MobileSecurity.Norton.com/
----------------
PRIVACY POLICY
NortonLifelock respects your privacy and promises to safeguard your personal data. For more information: http://www.norton.com/mobile-privacy-policy

This app uses the Device Administrator permission.

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.👈

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: MyTelkomsel – Check & Buy Packages, Redeem POIN
description:
Something that cannot be changed is the change itself. So, we change and innovate to improve everyone’s life. 
We know telecommunication and digital activities are essential in your daily life, that’s why we’ve made some improvements to let you find the products, promos, and solutions that suit you the most on MyTelkomsel every day.

Have you found the right data package? Now you have more payment options! Enjoy a more practical shopping experience with LinkAja, OVO, GoPay, DANA, ShopeePay and Kredivo to our league! For now, Kredivo is available to buy credits and soon for packages too. You can choose which payment method is easier for you to top up your credit balance, buy data packages, pay merchants, pay bills, buy game vouchers, donate, send money, and so on.

We also hope you like the new look on Send Gift pages, where you can easily send gifts based on the categories. Of course, you can make transactions and share packages securely!



Explore Your Needs

Exploring various choices of packages is so convenient. Now you can easily switch between pages, get offers, shop, send gifts, explore, and access your complete account profile. You can enjoy the new look and layout of your Account page too. Checking your SIM card info and changing between cards can be done with a swipe!

Don’t forget, you also have many services you should try: upgrade to 4G without coming out from your house, update your account details, ask Veronika, and book a GraPARI appointment. You can even do more such as exploring VAS services (CloudMAX, TanyaDok, PopCall, Magic Call), checking 4G coverage, and also accessing Help page. You can also check your Purchase History, roaming activation, and POIN redemption on MyTelkomsel. Never miss any transaction you made by easily accessing this feature.

More Fun Stuff in the Palm of Your Hand

We know you love our Daily Check In feature, so we keep it to keep you showered with special prizes by checking in to MyTelkomsel App every day. You can even play game now! No time to get bored at home. Play it, try to get the high score, and challenge your friends to beat your score.
Promo lovers can still enjoy offers such as discount vouchers from POIN redemption, lucky draw coupons, and many more. Just check the Rewards page, it’s super easy to browse and find the offers suitable for you. 

We are happy to receive your feedback. If you have any questions or other inputs, please email us at cs@telkomsel.co.id, mention @Telkomsel via Twitter/Facebook or through Get Help/Contact Us section on MyTelkomsel App. For further information, visit http://tsel.me/FAQ.

Oh, before you go out to explore, we would like to remind you that: 
- MyTelkomsel is optimized for smartphone use, not tablet.
- The compatibility with other device and other device resolutions are not guaranteed.

Fresher & Easier Account Page
MyTelkomsel has improved the account page. The structure of the menu has been improved and easier to explore. You can also easily change your SIM card with a simple swipe. 
Complete Your Daily Needs
There are various new features that are worth a try, and Kredivo is joining the league to complete your payment. Other payment methods are also still available when buying packages or topping up your credit balance. You can send gifts based on the product categories through the Send Gift feature, update your MyTelkomsel account details, and get assistance from our customer service including chatting directly with Veronika, our virtual assistant. Upgrading your SIM card to 4G is also possible without having to visit GraPARI outlet, but if you need to make a GraPARI appointment, it can be done via the app too.

What’s New on MyTelkomsel 5.6?
We keep improving our look and functionality for you with the following updates:
•	New design and layout on Account page
•	Added Kredivo as a new payment method
•	Sharing packages is even more secure
•	Bug fixes

comments: People can type any phone number and randomly obtain pin/password by calling the owner of the number. Security is a big issue in this app, especially for those that have tech literacy issue e.g, senior citizens. Once they have the pin, they can undertake unauthorized spending within the app. It happens to my family member. Security should be improved!

My Disappointment is Immeasurable and my day is ruined.firstly the app crashes like every 15-16 minutes I wasted my 50 thousand rupiahs to top up and my balance is still 0,I tried contacting but still it's useless to even contact and I'm not going to waste any time on this problem, and the second problem is that sometimes when I open the app the package usually loads slowly I usually don't have a problem but after the update the amount of bugs in this app is INSANE 2/10 bc of the amount of bugs

It was fine at first, but then all my credit dissapeared. I've checked my transaction and the only thing I bought was Rp.10 and I still had Rp.9.990 left. But they are all gone. I also checked my last transaction and it said something wierd about a transaction of 0.72KB for Rp.4320 which I didn't do and what even was it? Please explain and fix it.

Before new update, it works very well. But after updating, the app didn't work as like as before. It Always say "lost connection" or something, and when i press the reload button, still didn't work. Im even try reinstall the app but still got the same problem. I hope there's new update to fix those bug. It's really annoying honestly.

To open this application is needed the high level of patiece. This app is so slow, and the package is useless, you make a package to access for spesific application, then when we open another application it takes my regular credit. My credit never lasted more than a week, and when I wannna use my credit, I saw it's already 0. There is nothing that I can be proud of this provider.

title: Tiles Hop: EDM Rush!
description:
HOT! HOT! HOT!

Monstercat is going online. Play your favorite songs with our newest character. Try to get the highest scores with the FANTASTIC game ever!

Heard About EDM Tiles? With Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! you can play various types of music, from beautiful Piano, Guitar songs to Rock and EDM masterpieces. 

How to play

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tiles. 
2. Don't Miss the Tiles! 
3. You can now upload your own songs to play
4. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song.

The Ball will jump on the Beats Drop. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles. Do not Tap! This is not a Tap Tap game.
Don't forget to make insane combos and beat your friend's scores!

Hit Songs + Ball Game +  Tiles = Awesomeness
Game features
- Auto-generated content: upload your favorite songs to bounce to the music
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Breathtaking 3D visual and effects
- 30+ absolutely beautiful and fun songs to relax
- 20+ Different backgrounds to truly bring you a new experience every plays!
- Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls
- Beat your own top score and dare your best friends for a challenge
- Share your record with your friends, and compare it with worldwide players on the ranking list!
- Connect with Facebook account and sync the saved progress across multiple devices

Bounce off the magic music tiles, listen to the beat, and make as many hops as you can in this mind-blowing music game now for Free!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.

Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! is totally Free! Play this EDM music Running Game now!

In this game everything is fine except for the ads. I also want to highlight that I also want there real voice. Fix it pls. Other than that there is no problems with the game. And as this is a very relaxing game I would like to tell you all who can download, to download this asap, so that the whole world will be fully relaxing.

I like this app and the songs are really many, but i have a few suggestions. First of all it would be better if they put their real singing voice for the artists in the songs.The second one, there are some missing songs i like it would be an horner to add a little more songs. So that's my suggestions. Now the thing i like (not the ONLY thing) is that the one that says we can play our own songs. I really like that we can play different song. But other than those suggestion, the game is great!

Love this app!!! The graphics are pretty good, but the only reason why I gave this app four stars is because that I just don't really like watching ads. And finally, number 3, I don't like any types of ads no matter what. So can you PLEASE fix this? I really want to take a break from ads for now.

This is the first music game I love, better than cooler hop 3D and I just downloaded it. I can now see what 100 million people download it. title: Fruit Clinic
description:
Fruits need your help!

Prepare your tools and heal the fruits.
Be careful, as an official fruit operator take your job seriously and let the fruits leave your clinic happy.
The more fruits and vegetables you help the more you will earn.

Use your money to rank up your clinic and become the best fruit clinic in the planet.

Have fun and keep operating!

recentChanges: +Bug Fixes
comments: The game is bugged. I've been stuck on the same level without being to progress for several weeks. Ads are terrible. They're between every round and then some. I paid to remove them because the game is entertaining enough to want to be able to play but not 45 minutes after I paid to remove ads I haven't been able to play the game anymore. The ad I saw and downloaded it from showed the game being more complex than it actually is. It's just repetitive of the exact same things.

Ad before a level. Ad during a level. Ad after a level. Ad to get tools. Then after you get the too, yep you guessed it, ANOTHER AD!! The ads are nearly twice the length that the levels are! This isn't a game but a place for adverts. If you want people to actually enjoy this game then perhaps have an ad after every two to three levels. Ads ads ads. This game is not enjoyable! Uninstalling!!

I don't get ticked off by ads, the game is great but I have two requests. One: More decor, furniture, and the other one. One stopped at 20 , the other 21 and I haven't finished the other one. Another thing: Level 43. When I started, I cut open the aubergine and saw nothing. It's still screaming, there's no tweezers, and when you touch it, it zooms in. Please fix this!

There are way too many adverts for this game to even be playable. I think I got four levels in and on all four levels there was an advert before, during and after the level, then to get new tools, guess what? Another advert. Then to get decor for your office? Another advert. I get in, free games have adverts, but I should spend more time watching them than playing the game. And I only got to level 4 because I kept telling myself not every level will be like this. EVERY LEVEL IS LIKE THIS.

I got up to level 46 but I cannot go further for a bug won't let me get into my next tool. However there are many bugs that are good as well. Turning your internet off will not only get rid of all ads, you can still press "watch ad to claim" on all tools and bonus prizes and not have to watch an ad to get your reward. You will instantly get it. However you need to restart the games a few times after restarting your game in order for this to work.
